Tena taṃ pucchāma – ‘‘kiṃ te etesu ekekaṃ na hutvā na hoti, na hutvā na hotī’’ti. Paravādī sabbato andhakārena pariyonaddho viya tesaṃ nahutvānahotibhāvaṃ apassanto ^b^na heva^eb^nti paṭikkhipati.

[03]Tatiyavārepi yadi taññeva anāgataṃ taṃ paccuppannaṃ taṃ atītaṃ; anāgatapaccuppannānaṃ paccuppannātītesu vutto hotibhāvo, paccuppannātītānañca anāgatapaccuppannesu vutto hutvābhāvo āpajjati. Evaṃ sante anāgatampi hutvāhoti nāma. Paccuppannampi atītampi hutvā hotiyeva nāma. Tena taṃ pucchāma – ‘‘kiṃ te tīsupi etesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti ^a^M0.0154^ea^ hutvā hotī’’ti? Itaro ‘‘taññeva anāgataṃ, taṃ paccuppannaṃ, taṃ atīta’’ntipañhe paṭikkhittanayeneva paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho dutiyapañhe paṭiññātanayeneva paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ sakavādī ‘‘taññeva anāgataṃ, taṃ paccuppannaṃ, taṃ atīta’’nti pañhāvasena tesu ekekaṃ hutvā hoti, hutvā hotīti paṭijānantaṃ purimaṃ paṭikkhittapañhaṃ parivattitvā pucchanto ^b^na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotī^eb^ti pucchati. Tassattho ^a^P0.0049^ea^ – nanu tayā taññeva anāgataṃ, taṃ paccuppannaṃ, taṃ atītanti vutte paṭhamapañhaṃ paṭikkhipantena anāgatapaccuppannānaṃ hotibhāvo; paccuppannātītānañca hutvābhāvo paṭikkhittoti? Tena anāgataṃ paccuppannañca na hoti nāma. Paccuppannañca atītañca na hutvā nāma.

[03]Dutiyapañhe ca te ‘‘taññeva anāgataṃ, taṃ paccuppannaṃ, taṃ atīta’’nti paṭiññātaṃ. Evaṃ sante anāgatampi na hutvā na hoti nāma, paccuppannampi atītampi na hutvā na hotiyeva nāma. Tena taṃ pucchāma – ‘‘kiṃ te etesu ekekaṃ na hutvā na hoti na hutvā na hotī’’ti? Paravādī sabbato andhakārena pariyonaddho viya tesaṃ na hutvā na hotibhāvaṃ apassanto ^b^na heva^eb^nti paṭikkhipatīti. Niggahādīni panettha heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yojetabbāni.
[06]Vacanasodhanavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^289^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atītaṃ^eb^^a^V0.0150^ea^^b^cakkhu atthī^eb^tiādīsupi cakkhādibhāvāvijahaneneva atthitaṃ paṭijānāti. ^b^Passatī^eb^tiādīni puṭṭho pana tesaṃ viññāṇānaṃ kiccābhāvavasena paṭikkhipati.

[03]^b^290^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyaṃ ^b^karotī^eb^ti pañhe tassa ñāṇassa niruddhattā kiccabhāvamassa apassanto paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho atītārammaṇaṃ paccuppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ atītānaṃ dhammānaṃ jānanato atītaṃ ñāṇanti ^a^M0.0155^ea^ lesena paccuppannameva ‘‘atītaṃ ñāṇa’’nti katvā tena ñāṇena ñāṇakaraṇīyassa atthitāya paṭijānāti. Athassa sakavādī lesokāsaṃ adatvā ^b^tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānātī^eb^tiādimāha. Itaro atītārammaṇeneva ñāṇena imesaṃ catunnaṃ kiccānaṃ abhāvā ^a^P0.0050^ea^ paṭikkhipati. Anāgatapañhepi eseva nayo. Paccuppannapañho ceva saṃsandanapañho ca uttānatthāyeva.
[03]^b^291^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Arahato atīto rāgo atthī^eb^tiādīsupi rāgādibhāvāvijahanto evaṃ paṭijānāti. ^b^Sarāgo^eb^tiādīsu suttavirodhabhayena ceva yuttivirodhabhayena ca paṭikkhipati.

[03]^b^295^eb^^b^.^eb^ Evaṃ sabbampi pāḷianusāreneva viditvā parato ^b^atthi siyā atītaṃ, siyā nvātīta^eb^nti ettha evamattho veditabbo. Yaṃ atītameva atthi, taṃ atītaṃ. Yaṃ paccuppannānāgataṃ atthi, taṃ no atthi, taṃ no atītaṃ. ^b^Tenātītaṃ nvātītaṃ, nvātītaṃ atīta^eb^nti tena kāraṇena atītaṃ no atītaṃ, no atītaṃ atītanti. Anāgatapaccuppannapucchāsupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^296^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na^eb^^a^V0.0151^ea^^b^vattabbaṃ ‘‘atītaṃ atthi anāgataṃ atthī’’^eb^ti suttasādhanāya pucchā paravādissa, paṭiññā sakavādissa. Puna attano laddhiṃ nissāya ^b^yaṃkiñci, bhikkhave, rūpa^eb^nti anuyogo paravādisseva. Dutiyanaye pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Evaṃ sabbattha pucchā ca paṭiññā ca veditabbā. Yaṃ panetaṃ paravādinā anāgatassa atthibhāvasādhanatthaṃ ‘‘nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā kabaḷīkāre, ce, bhikkhave’’ti suttassa pariyosāne ^b^atthi tattha āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattī^eb^tiādi dassitaṃ na taṃ anāgatassa atthibhāvasādhakaṃ ^a^M0.0156^ea^. Tañhi hetūnaṃ pariniṭṭhitattā avassaṃ bhāvitaṃ sandhāya tattha vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ suttādhippāyo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Sabbamatthītikathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^297^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ‘‘atītaṃ khandhā’’tiādikathā hoti. Tattha khandhādibhāvāvijahanato atītānāgatānaṃ atthitaṃ icchantassa ^b^atītaṃ khandhā^eb^ti pucchā paravādissa, atītassa khandhasaṅgahitattā ^b^āmantā^eb^ti paṭiññā sakavādissa. Puna ^b^atītaṃ^eb^^a^P0.0051^ea^^b^natthī^eb^ti pucchā paravādissa, tassa niruttipathasuttena atthitāya vāritattā paṭikkhepo sakavādissa. Āyatanadhātupucchāsupi anāgatapañhesupi paccuppannena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā anulomapaṭilomato āgatapañhesupi ‘‘atītaṃ rūpa’’ntiādipañhesupi imināvupāyena attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^298^eb^^b^.^eb^ Suttasādhane ^a^V0.0152^ea^ pana ^b^na vattabba^eb^nti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha ^b^natthi cete^eb^ti natthi ca ete dhammāti attho. Khandhādibhāve sati natthitaṃ anicchantassa ^b^āmantā^eb^ti paṭiññā paravādissa, atha nesaṃ natthibhāvasādhanatthaṃ suttāharaṇaṃ sakavādissa. Dutiyapucchāpi paravādissa, paṭiññā sakavādissa, suttāharaṇaṃ paravādissa. Taṃ pana nesaṃ khandhādibhāvameva sādheti, na atthibhāvanti āhaṭampi anāhaṭasadisamevāti.
[06]Atītaṃ khandhātiādikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^299^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0157^ea^^b^ekaccaṃ atthī^eb^ti kathā hoti. Tattha ye ‘‘ekaccaṃ atītaṃ atthī’’ti maññanti, seyyathāpi kassapikā; tesaṃ laddhibhindanatthaṃ ^b^atītaṃ atthī^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, ^b^ekaccaṃ atthī^eb^ti vissajjanaṃ paravādissa. Ayañhi adhippāyo – avipakkavipākaṃ atthi, vipakkavipākaṃ natthīti. ^b^Ekaccaṃ niruddha^eb^nti anuyogo sakavādissa. Tassattho – yadi te atītaṃ ekaccaṃ atthi ekaccaṃ natthi, evaṃ sante ekaccaṃ atītaṃ niruddhaṃ, ekaccaṃ atītaṃ aniruddhaṃ, tatheva ṭhitanti āpajjati. ^b^Vigata^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Avipakkavipākadhammā ekacce^eb^ti idaṃ yasmā yesaṃ so avipakkavipākānaṃ atthitaṃ icchati, tepi atītāyeva. Tasmā yathā te atītaṃ ekaccaṃ atthi, kiṃ tathā avipakkavipākāpi dhammā ^a^P0.0052^ea^ ekacce atthī ekacce natthīti codetuṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Vipakkavipākā^eb^ti idaṃ yesaṃ so natthitaṃ icchati, tesaṃ vasena codetuṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Avipākā^eb^ti idaṃ abyākatānaṃ vasena codetuṃ vuttaṃ. Iti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ rāsīnaṃ vasena sabbesu anulomapaṭilomesu paṭiññā ca ^a^V0.0153^ea^ paṭikkhepo ca veditabbā. Atītā ekadesaṃ vipakkavipākā, ekadesaṃ avipakkavipākāti vippakatavipākā vuccanti. Yena hi kammena paṭisandhi nibbattitā, bhavaṅgampi cutipi tasseva vipāko. Tasmā paṭisandhito yāva cuti, tāva taṃ vippakatavipākaṃ nāma hoti. Tathārūpe dhamme sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Vipaccissantīti katvā te atthī^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa. Yathā dhammadharassa puggalassa niddāyantassāpi bahupavattino dhammā atthīti vuccanti, evaṃ lokavohāravasena atthitaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā paravādissa. ^b^Vipaccissantīti katvā paccupannā^eb^ti dutiyapañhe ‘‘kammānaṃ avināsasaṅkhāto kammūpacayo nāmeko atthī’’ti laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭiññā paravādissa.
[03]^b^300^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anāgataṃ^eb^^a^M0.0158^ea^^b^atthī^eb^tiādīsupi ^b^ekaccaṃ atthī^eb^ti uppādino dhamme sandhāya vadati. Sesaṃ sabbattha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Ekaccaṃatthītikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^301^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni satipaṭṭhānakathā hoti. ‘‘Tattha – catunnaṃ, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.408) satipaṭṭhānasaṃyutte vuttanayeneva yesaṃ kāyādayo satiyā ārammaṇadhamme gahetvā ‘‘sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ. Andhakā nāma pubbaseliyā, aparaseliyā, rājagiriyā, siddhatthikāti ime pacchā uppannanikāyā. Tesaṃ laddhivivecanatthaṃ pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. Tattha yasmā ‘‘patiṭṭhāti etesūti ^b^paṭṭhānā^eb^^a^P0.0053^ea^. Kā patiṭṭhāti? Sati. Satiyā paṭṭhānā ^b^satipaṭṭhānā’’^eb^ti iminā atthena satigocarāpi satipaṭṭhānā. ‘‘Patiṭṭhahantīti ^b^paṭṭhānā^eb^. Kā ^a^V0.0154^ea^ patiṭṭhahanti? Satiyo. Satiyova paṭṭhānā satipaṭṭhānā’’ti iminā atthena satiyova satipaṭṭhānā. Tasmā ^b^dve^eb^pi vādā pariyāyena yujjanti. Ye pana taṃ pariyāyaṃ pahāya ekanteneva ‘‘sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānā’’ti vadanti, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, ārammaṇavasena paṭiññā paravādissa. ^b^Sabbe dhammā satī^eb^ti anuyuttassa pana sabbesaṃ satisabhāvābhāvato paṭikkhepo tasseva. Tattha ^b^khayagāmī^eb^tiādīni maggavisesanāni. Ekāyanamaggo hi kilesānaṃ khayabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchatīti ^b^khayagāmī^eb^. Cattāri saccāni bujjhanto gacchatīti ^b^bodhagāmī^eb^. Vaṭṭaṃ apacinanto gacchatīti ^b^apacayagāmī^eb^. Evametehi padehi ‘‘kiṃ te sabbe dhammā evarūpo te ekāyano maggo hotī’’ti pucchati. ^b^Anāsavā asaṃyojaniyā^eb^tiādīnipi lokuttarabhāvaṃ pucchanatthāya vuttāni. ^b^Buddhānussatī^eb^tiādīni pabhedapucchāvasena vuttāni.

[03]^b^Cakkhāyatanaṃ^eb^^a^M0.0159^ea^^b^satipaṭṭhāna^eb^ntiādi sabbadhammānaṃ pabhedapucchāvasena vuttaṃ. Tatthāpi sativasena paṭikkhepo, ārammaṇavasena paṭiññāti. Evaṃ sabbapañhesu attho veditabbo. Suttasādhanā uttānatthāyevāti.
[06]Satipaṭṭhānakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^304^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni hevatthikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘sabbepi atītādibhedā dhammā rūpādivasena atthi, atītaṃ anāgatapaccuppannavasena, anāgatapaccuppannāni vā atītādivasena natthi; tasmā sabbamevidaṃ evaṃ atthi evaṃ natthī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi vuttappabhedānaṃ andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^atītaṃ atthī^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa. ^b^Hevatthi heva natthī^eb^ti vissajjanaṃ paravādissa. Tattha ^b^hevā^eb^ti evaṃ ^a^P0.0054^ea^. Atha naṃ sakavādī ‘‘yadi atītova evaṃ atthi, evaṃ natthīti laddhi, evaṃ sante soyeva atthi, soyeva natthi nāmā’’ti pucchanto ^b^sevatthi, seva natthī^eb^ti āha. Itaro teneva sabhāvena atthitaṃ, teneva natthitaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho ^a^V0.0155^ea^ sakabhāveneva atthitaṃ, parabhāveneva natthitaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Tato paraṃ ^b^atthaṭṭho natthaṭṭho^eb^ti atthisabhāvo natthisabhāvo nāma hotīti pucchati. Imināvupāyena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo. Pariyosāne pana ^b^‘‘tena hi atītaṃ hevatthi, heva natthī’’^eb^ti ca ‘‘tena hi rūpaṃ hevatthi, heva natthī’’ti cātiādīni vatvā kiñcāpi paravādinā laddhi patiṭṭhāpitā, ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā panesā appatiṭṭhāpitāyevāti.
[06]Hevatthikathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Mahāvaggo niṭṭhito.

[03]^b^307^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0055^ea^^a^M0.0160^ea^ parūpahārakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ye arahattaṃ paṭijānantānaṃ appatte pattasaññīnaṃ adhimānikānaṃ kuhakānaṃ vā arahattaṃ paṭijānantānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ disvā ‘‘mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṃ upasaṃharantī’’ti maññanti; seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyā ca aparaseliyā ca; te sandhāya ^b^atthi arahato^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Idāni yasmā sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma rāgasamuṭṭhānā hoti, tasmā ^b^atthi arahato rāgo^eb^ti anuyogo āraddho. So sabbopi uttānatthoyeva.

[03]^b^Mārakāyikā devatā attano^eb^tiādipañhe yasmā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhi nāma natthi, aññesampi sukkaṃ gahetvā na upasaṃharanti, arahato pana sukkameva natthi, tasmā ^b^na heva^eb^nti paṭikkhipati.
[03]^b^Neva attano^eb^tipañhe pana nimminitvā upasaṃharantīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti. ^b^Lomakūpehī^eb^tipañhe sappitelānaṃ viya lomakūpehi upasaṃharaṇābhāvaṃ disvā paṭikkhipati.

[03]^b^308^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Handa^eb^^a^V0.0156^ea^^b^hī^eb^ti vacasāyatthe nipāto. ‘‘Arahā nu kho ahaṃ, no’’ti evaṃ vimatiṃ gāhayissāmāti evaṃ vacasāyaṃ katvā upasaṃharantīti attho. ^b^Atthi arahato vimatī^eb^ti puṭṭho aṭṭhavatthukaṃ vicikicchaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, dutiyaṃ puṭṭho itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottādīsu sanniṭṭhānābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
[03]^b^309^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atthi tassa āsayo^eb^ti tassa sukkassa uccārapassāvānaṃ viya patiṭṭhānokāso atthīti pucchati.

[03]^b^312^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sadhammakusalassā^eb^ti attano arahattadhammamatteyeva kusalassa. Paññāvimuttaṃ sandhāyevaṃ ^a^P0.0056^ea^ vadati. ^b^Paradhammakusalassā^eb^ti sadhammato parasmiṃ ^a^M0.0161^ea^ aṭṭhasamāpattidhammepi kusalassa. Ubhatobhāgavimuttaṃ sandhāyevaṃ vadati. Sesamettha pāḷianusāreneva veditabbanti.
[06]Parūpahārakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^314^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni aññāṇaṃ, kaṅkhā, paravitaraṇāti tisso kathā nāma honti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘arahato itthipurisādīnaṃ nāmagottādīsu ñāṇappavattiyā abhāvena atthi aññāṇaṃ, tattheva sanniṭṭhānābhāvena atthi kaṅkhā. Yasmā ca nesaṃ tāni vatthūni pare vitaranti pakāsenti ācikkhanti, tasmā nesaṃ atthi paravitaraṇā’’ti imā laddhiyo, seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyādīnaṃ; tesaṃ tā laddhiyo bhindituṃ tīsupi kathāsu pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca itarassa. Tattha sabbesupi pañhesu ceva vissajjanesu ca pāḷiṃ anugantvāva attho veditabboti.
[06]Aññāṇādikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^326^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0157^ea^ vacībhedakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa dukkhanti vācā bhijjatī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyādīnaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^samāpannassa atthi vacībhedo^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭiññā paravādissa. Puna ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti tayo bhave sandhāya puṭṭho arūpaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. ^b^Sabbadā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0057^ea^ kālavasena puṭṭho paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe paṭhamajjhānikasamāpattito aññaṃ sabbaṃ samāpattikālaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. ^b^Sabbesaṃ samāpannāna^eb^nti puṭṭho lokiyasamāpattiyo samāpanne sandhāya paṭikkhipati. ^b^Sabbasamāpattīsū^eb^ti puṭṭho dutiyajjhānādikaṃ lokuttaraṃ sabbañca lokiyasamāpattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.

[03]^b^Kāyabhedo^eb^ti ^a^M0.0162^ea^ abhikkamādivasena pavattakāyaviññatti. Idaṃ ‘‘yāni cittāni vacīviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpenti, tāneva kāyaviññattiṃ. Evaṃ sante kasmā kāyabhedopi na hotī’’ti codanatthaṃ pucchati. Itaro laddhivasena paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca. Idāni yadi so maggakkhaṇe ‘‘dukkha’’nti vācaṃ bhāsati, ‘‘samudayo’’tiādikampi bhāseyya. Yadi vā taṃ na bhāsati, itarampi na bhāseyyāti codanatthaṃ ^b^dukkhanti jānanto^eb^tiādayo pañhā vuttā. Itaro pana attano laddhivaseneva paṭijānāti ceva paṭikkhipati ca. Lokuttaraṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpanno dukkhadukkhanti vipassatīti hissa laddhi.
[03]^b^328^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ñāṇa^eb^nti lokuttaraṃ catusaccañāṇaṃ. ^b^Sota^eb^nti sotaviññāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ, yena taṃ saddaṃ suṇāti. ^b^Dvinnaṃ phassāna^eb^nti sotasamphassamanosamphassānaṃ.

[03]^b^329^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^No vata re vattabbe^eb^ti yadi avisesena yaṃkiñci samāpannassa natthi vacībhedo, na avisesena vattabbaṃ ‘‘samāpannassa atthi vacībhedo’’ti. Sesamettha uttānatthameva saddhiṃ suttasādhanāya. Yaṃ panetena ‘‘sikhissa ānanda, bhagavato’’ti pariyosāne suttaṃ ābhataṃ, tattha yena samāpatticittena so vacībhedo samuṭṭhito, kāyabhedopi tena samuṭṭhātiyeva, na ca taṃ lokuttaraṃ paṭhamajjhānacittaṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
[06]Vacībhedakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^334^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0158^ea^ dukkhāhārakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘dukkhaṃ dukkhanti vācaṃ bhāsanto dukkhe ñāṇaṃ āharati, taṃ dukkhāhāro nāma vuccati ^a^P0.0058^ea^. Tañca panetaṃ maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpanna’’nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi pubbaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^dukkhāhāro^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. ^b^Ye kecī^eb^ti paṭhamapañhe avipassake sandhāya paṭikkhipati, dutiyapañhe ^a^M0.0163^ea^ vipassake sandhāya paṭijānāti, taṃ panassa laddhimattameva. Tasmā ‘‘sabbe te’’ti vādassa bhindanatthaṃ ^b^bālaputhujjanā^eb^tiādimāha. Taṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Dukkhāhārakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^335^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni cittaṭṭhitikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ samāpatticittañceva bhavaṅgacittañca anuppabandhena pavattamānaṃ disvā ‘‘ekameva cittaṃ ciraṃ tiṭṭhatī’’ti laddhi seyyathāpi etarahi heṭṭhā vuttappabhedānaṃ andhakānaṃ, taṃladdhivisodhanatthaṃ ^b^ekaṃ, cittaṃ divasaṃ tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. ^b^Upaḍḍhadivaso uppādakkhaṇo^eb^ti ettha ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ anāmasitvā ‘‘aniccā vata saṅkhārā, uppādavayadhammino’’ti (saṃ. ni. 1.186; 2.143) desanānayena uppādavayavaseneva pucchā katā.

[03]^b^Te dhammā cittena lahuparivattā^eb^ti puṭṭho cittato lahutaraparivattino dhamme apassanto paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yassa cittassa dīghaṭṭhitiṃ icchati, taṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti pañhe ‘‘cullāsītisahassāni, kappā tiṭṭhanti ye marū’’tiādivacanavasena (mahāni. 10) āruppato aññatra paṭikkhipati, āruppe paṭijānāti. ^b^Muhuttaṃ muhuttaṃ uppajjatī^eb^ti pañhe paravādissa ‘‘uppādavayadhammino’’tiādisuttavirodhabhayena paṭijānāti. Ṭhitiṃ panassa laddhivasena icchati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Cittaṭṭhitikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^338^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0059^ea^^a^V0.0159^ea^ kukkuḷakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, ādittaṃ (saṃ. ni. 4.28; mahāva. 54) sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā’’tiādīni (dha. pa. 278) suttāni ayoniso gahetvā ^a^M0.0164^ea^ ‘‘nippariyāyeneva sabbe saṅkhārā kukkuḷā vītaccitaṅgārasammissā chārikanirayasadisā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi gokulikānaṃ; tesaṃ nānappakārasukhasandassanena taṃ laddhiṃ vivecetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. Tattha ^b^anodhiṃ katvā^eb^ti odhiṃ mariyādaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ akaritvā, avisesena sabbeyevāti attho. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ suttasādhanāyāti.
[06]Kukkuḷakathāvaṇṇanā.
[03]^b^339^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni anupubbābhisamayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ –
[21]‘‘Anupubbena medhāvī, thokaṃ thokaṃ khaṇe khaṇe;
[22]Kammāro rajatasseva, niddhame malamattano’’ti. (dha. pa. 239) –

[07]Ādīni suttāni ayoniso gahetvā ‘‘sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno ekacce kilese dukkhadassanena pajahati, ekacce samudayanirodhamaggadassanena, tathā sesāpīti evaṃ soḷasahi koṭṭhāsehi anupubbena kilesappahānaṃ katvā arahattapaṭilābho hotī’’ti evarūpā nānābhisamayaladdhi uppannā, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakasabbatthikasammitiyabhadrayānikānaṃ; tesaṃ laddhivivecanatthaṃ ^b^anupubbābhisamayo^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Anupubbena sotāpattimagga^eb^nti puṭṭho pana ekassa maggassa bahubhāvāpattibhayena paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho dukkhadassanādivasena paṭijānāti. Tāni vā cattāripi ñāṇāni eko sotāpattimaggoyevāti ^a^V0.0160^ea^ paṭijānāti, phalaṃ pana ekameva icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Sakadāgāmimaggādīsupi ^a^P0.0060^ea^ eseva nayo.

[03]^b^344^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Magge diṭṭhe phale ṭhito^eb^ti pañhe yasmā dukkhadassanādīhi dassanaṃ apariniṭṭhitaṃ, maggadassanena pariniṭṭhitaṃ nāma hoti, tadā so phale ṭhitoti saṅkhaṃ gacchati, tasmā paṭijānāti.

[03]^b^345^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dukkhe^eb^^a^M0.0165^ea^^b^diṭṭhe cattāri saccānī^eb^ti pucchā paravādissa, ekābhisamayavasena paṭiññā sakavādissa. Puna ^b^dukkhasaccaṃ cattāri saccānī^eb^ti anuyoge catunnampi nānāsabhāvattā paṭikkhepo tasseva.

[03]^b^Rūpakkhandhe aniccato diṭṭhe^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, samuddato ekabindussa rase paṭividdhe sesaudakassa paṭivedho viya ekadhamme aniccādito paṭividdhe sabbepi paṭividdhā hontīti laddhiyā paṭiññā paravādissa.

[03]^b^Catūhi ñāṇehī^eb^ti dukkhe ñāṇādīhi. ^b^Aṭṭhahi ñāṇehī^eb^ti sāvakānaṃ sādhāraṇehi saccañāṇehi ceva paṭisambhidāñāṇehi ca. ^b^Dvādasahi ñāṇehī^eb^ti dvādasaṅgapaṭiccasamuppādañāṇehi. ^b^Catucattārīsāya ñāṇehī^eb^ti ‘‘jarāmaraṇe ñāṇaṃ, jarāmaraṇasamudaye ñāṇa’’nti evaṃ nidānavagge vuttañāṇehi. ^b^Sattasattatiyā ñāṇehī^eb^ti ‘‘jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhamma’’nti (saṃ. ni. 2.20) evaṃ tattheva vuttañāṇehi. Sesamettha pāḷinayeneva veditabbaṃ saddhiṃ suttasādhanenāti.
[06]Anupubbābhisamayakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^347^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0161^ea^ vohārakathā nāma hoti. Tattha buddho bhagavā lokuttarena vohārena voharatīti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, laddhivasena paṭiññā paravādissa. ^b^Lokuttare sote^eb^tiādīni tassa ayuttavādībhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttāni. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – ‘‘saddāyatanameva te lokuttaraṃ, udāhu sotādīnipī’’ti.

[03]^b^Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatī^eb^ti ettha yadi so lokuttare paṭihaññeyya. Lokuttaro siyāti evamattho na gahetabbo. Lokiye ^a^P0.0061^ea^ paṭihaññamānassa pana lokuttaratā nāma natthīti ayametthādhippāyo. ^b^Lokiyena viññāṇenā^eb^ti etthāpi lokiyenevāti ^a^M0.0166^ea^ attho. Itarathā anekantatā siyā. Lokuttarañhi lokiyenapi ñāṇena ñāyatī. Evaṃ sabbaṃ yathānurūpato veditabbaṃ. ^b^Sabbe te maggaṃ bhāventī^eb^ti pañhesu ye maggaṃ nappaṭilabhanti, te sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Ye paṭilabhanti, te sandhāya paṭijānāti.
[03]^b^351^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sovaṇṇamayāyā^eb^ti suvaṇṇamayāya. Idaṃ paravādissa udāharaṇaṃ.
[03]^b^Eḷaṇḍiyāyā^eb^ti eḷaṇḍamayāya. Idaṃ sakavādissa udāharaṇaṃ. Lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiyoti ayampi ekā laddhi. Sā etarahi ekaccānaṃ andhakānaṃ laddhi. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Vohārakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^353^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni nirodhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ appaṭisaṅkhānirodhañca paṭisaṅkhānirodhañca dvepi ekato katvā nirodhasaccanti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi mahisāsakānañceva andhakānañca; te sandhāya ^b^dve nirodhā^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa ^a^V0.0162^ea^. ^b^Dve dukkhanirodhā^eb^ti pañhesu yasmā dve dukkhasaccāni na icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Yasmā dvīhākārehi dukkhaṃ nirujjhatīti icchati, tasmā paṭijānāti. ^b^Dve nirodhasaccānī^eb^tipañhesu dvinnaṃ dukkhasaccānaṃ nirodhavasenaanicchanto paṭikkhipati. Dvīhākārehi dukkhassa nirujjhanato paṭijānāti. ^b^Dve tāṇānī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo.
[03]^b^Atthi dvinnaṃ nibbānāna^eb^ntiādīsu pucchāsu uccanīcatādīni apassanto paṭikkhipati.

[03]^b^Appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhe^eb^ti ye paṭisaṅkhāya lokuttarena ñāṇena aniruddhā suddhapakatikattā vā uddesaparipucchādīnaṃ vā vasena na samudācaraṇato niruddhāti vuccanti, te saṅkhāre. ^b^Paṭisaṅkhā nirodhentī^eb^ti. Lokuttarañāṇena nirodhenti anuppattibhāvaṃ gamenti. ^b^Nanu appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhā saṅkhārā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0062^ea^ pucchā paravādissa ^a^M0.0167^ea^. Tattha bhaggānaṃ puna abhañjanato appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhānaṃ vā ariyamagge uppanne tathā nirujjhanatova sakavādī accantabhaggataṃ paṭijānāti. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Nirodhakathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Dutiyo vaggo.

[03]^b^354^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0063^ea^ balakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ anuruddhasaṃyutte ‘‘imesañca panāhaṃ, āvuso, catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāmī’’tiādīni (saṃ. ni. 5.913) dasasuttāni ayoniso gahetvā ‘‘tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇa’’nti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭiññā paravādissa. Tathāgatabalañca nāmetaṃ sāvakehi sādhāraṇampi atthi asādhāraṇampi sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇampi. Tattha āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ. Indriyaparopariyattiñāṇaṃ ^a^V0.0163^ea^ asādhāraṇaṃ. Sesaṃ sādhāraṇañca asādhāraṇañca. Ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni hi sāvakā padesena jānanti, tathāgatā nippadesena. Iti tāni uddesato sādhāraṇāni, na niddesato. Ayaṃ pana avisesena sabbampi sādhāraṇanti āha. Tamenaṃ tato vivecetuṃ ^b^tathāgatabalaṃ sāvakabala^eb^nti puna anuyogo āraddho. Tattha paṭhamapañhe niddesato sabbākāravisayataṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiyapañhe uddesato ṭhānāṭṭhānamattādijānanavasena paṭijānāti. ^b^Taññevā^eb^tiādipañhesu sabbākārena ninnānākaraṇatāya abhāvena paṭikkhipati. ^b^Pubbayogo^eb^ ca ^b^pubbacariyā^eb^ ca atthato ekaṃ, tathā ^b^dhammakkhāna^eb^ñca ^b^dhammadesanā^eb^ ca.
[03]Indriyaparopariyattipañhe ekadesena sādhāraṇataṃ sandhāya sāvakavisaye paṭijānāti.

[03]^b^355^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0168^ea^ yasmā uddesato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni sāvako jānāti, tasmā sāvakassa tathā jānanaṃ pakāsetvā tena jānanamattasāmaññena tesaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇattaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ ^b^sāvako ṭhānāṭṭhānaṃ^eb^^a^P0.0064^ea^^b^jānātī^eb^tiādayo paravādipañhā honti. Tattha indriyaparopariyattiñāṇaṃ channaṃ asādhāraṇañāṇānaṃ aññataranti na gahitaṃ. ^b^Āsavakkhayena vā āsavakkhaya^eb^nti yaṃ tathāgatassa āsavakkhayena saddhiṃ sāvakassa āsavakkhayaṃ paṭicca vattabbaṃ siyā nānākaraṇaṃ, taṃ natthi. ^b^Vimuttiyā vā vimutti^eb^nti padepi eseva nayo. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.

[03]^b^356^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni yaṃ sakavādinā ‘‘āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ sādhāraṇa’’nti anuññātaṃ, tena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā sesānampi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ pucchituṃ puna ^b^āsavānaṃ khaye^eb^tiādayo paravādipañhāva honti. Tesaṃ vissajjane sakavādinā āsavakkhaye visesābhāvena taṃ ñāṇaṃ sādhāraṇanti anuññātaṃ. Itaresupi visesābhāvena sādhāraṇatā paṭikkhittā. Puna ṭhānāṭṭhānādīnaṃ āsavakkhayeneva saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā asādhāraṇapucchā paravādisseva. Tattha āsavakkhayañāṇe paṭikkhepo, sesesu ca paṭiññā sakavādissa. Tato indriyaparopariyattena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā asādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa. Sā saṅkhipitvā dassitā. Tathāpi indriyaparopariyatte paṭiññā, sesesu ca paṭikkhepo sakavādissa. Tato ṭhānāṭṭhānādīhi saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā indriyaparopariyattassa sādhāraṇapucchā paravādissa. Sāpi saṅkhipitvāva dassitā. Tattha indriyaparopariyatte paṭikkhepo. Sesesu ca paṭiññā sakavādissāti.
[06]Balakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^357^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0164^ea^ ariyantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘na kevalaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇameva ariyaṃ, atha kho purimānipi nava balāni ariyāni’’cceva laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^ariya^eb^nti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Puna yadi taṃ ariyaṃ, maggādīsu tena aññatarena ^a^M0.0169^ea^ bhavitabbanti maggādivasena pucchā sakavādissa, paṭikkhepo itarassa.

[03]Puna suññatārammaṇādivasena pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha dve suññatā – sattasuññatā ca saṅkhārasuññatā ca. Sattasuññatā nāma diṭṭhiyā ^a^P0.0065^ea^ parikappitena sattena suññā pañcakkhandhā. Saṅkhārasuññatā nāma sabbasaṅkhārehi suññaṃ vivittaṃ nissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ. Tattha paravādī nibbānārammaṇataṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, saṅkhārārammaṇataṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Manasi karotī^eb^ti puṭṭhopi nibbānameva sandhāya paṭikkhipati, saṅkhāre sandhāya paṭijānāti. Tato sakavādinā ‘‘ṭhānāṭṭhānādimanasikāro saṅkhārārammaṇo, suññatamanasikāro nibbānārammaṇo’’ti imaṃ nayaṃ gahetvā ‘‘dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotī’’ti puṭṭho lesokāsaṃ alabhanto paṭikkhipati. Animittāpaṇihitesupi eseva nayo. Sattanimittābhāvato hi khandhā animittā. Saṅkhāranimittābhāvato nibbānaṃ. Ekadhammasmimpi āropetvā ṭhapetabbasaṅkhātena ca paṇidahitabbaṭṭhena paṇihitasaṅkhaṃ gatena sattapaṇidhinā appaṇihitā khandhā. Taṇhāpaṇidhinā taṇhāya vā ārammaṇabhūtena sabbasaṅkhārapaṇidhinā appaṇihitaṃ nibbānaṃ. Tasmā idhāpi paṭikkhepo ca paṭiññā ca purimanayeneva veditabbā.

[03]^b^358^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tato ‘‘yathā satipaṭṭhānādayo lokuttaradhammā ariyā ceva suññatādiārammaṇā ca, kiṃ te evaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇa’’nti anulomapaṭilomapucchā honti. Tattha sabbāpi paṭiññā sabbe ca paṭikkhepā paravādisseva. Imināvupāyena sesañāṇesupi pucchāvissajjanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pana sesāni saṅkhipitvā avasāne cutūpapātañāṇameva vibhattaṃ. Tato paraṃ sakasamayepi ‘‘ariya’’nti siddhena āsavānaṃ khayañāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā sesañāṇānaṃ anulomato ca paṭilomato ca ariyabhāvapucchā honti. Tā sabbā paravādissa, paṭiññā paṭikkhepo ca sakavādissa ^a^V0.0165^ea^. Te uttānatthāyeva. Pāḷiyaṃ panettha paṭhamanavamāneva dassetvā satta ñāṇāni saṅkhittānīti.
[06]Ariyantikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^363^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0066^ea^^a^M0.0170^ea^ vimuttikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘vītarāgacittānaṃ vimuttipayojanaṃ nāma natthi. Yathā pana malīnaṃ vatthaṃ dhoviyamānaṃ malā vimuccati, evaṃ sarāgaṃ cittaṃ rāgato vimuccatī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^sarāga^eb^nti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Tato ^b^rāgasahagata^eb^ntiādinā nayena puṭṭho maggakkhaṇe cittaṃ vimuccati nāma. Tadā ca evarūpaṃ cittaṃ natthīti paṭikkhipati.
[03]Saphassantiādinā nayena puṭṭhopi yathā phasso ca cittañca ubho rāgato vimuccanti, evaṃ rāgassa vimuttiṃ apassamāno paṭikkhipati. Sadosādīsupi imināvupāyena attho veditabbo.
[06]Vimuttikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^366^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni vimuccamānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘jhānena vikkhambhanavimuttiyā vimuttaṃ, maggakkhaṇe samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṃ nāma hotī’’ti laddhi, te sandhāya ^b^vimuttaṃ vimuccamāna^eb^nti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarasa.

[03]Puna ^b^ekadesa^eb^nti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha ^b^ekadesa^eb^nti bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ. Yathā vimuttaṃ, ekadesena ^a^V0.0166^ea^ vā ekadese vā avimuttaṃ hoti kiṃ evaṃ ekadesaṃ vimuttaṃ, ekadesaṃ avimuttanti pucchati. Kiṃ kāraṇā evaṃ pucchatīti? ‘‘Vimuttaṃ vimuccamāna’’nti vippakatabhāvena vuttattā. Yathā hi kariyamānā kaṭādayo vippakatattā ekadesena katā ekadesena akatā honti, tathā idampi ekadesaṃ vimuttaṃ ekadesaṃ avimuttanti āpajjati. Tato paravādī kaṭādīnaṃ viya cittassa ekadesābhāvā paṭhamapañhe paṭikkhipitvā dutiye vimuccamānassa apariniṭṭhitavimuttitāya paṭijānāti. Lokiyajjhānakkhaṇaṃ vā sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Na hi taṃ tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuccamānaṃ. Lokuttarajjhānakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Tañhi tadā samucchedavimuttiyā vimuttekadesena ^a^P0.0067^ea^ vimuccamānantissa laddhi. Tato sakavādī ‘‘yadi te ekameva ^a^M0.0171^ea^ cittaṃ ekadesaṃ vimuttaṃ ekadesaṃ avimuttaṃ, evaṃ sante yo ekeneva cittena sotāpanno hoti, sopi te ekadesaṃ sotāpanno, ekadesaṃ na sotāpanno āpajjatī’’ti codanatthaṃ ^b^ekadesaṃ sotāpanno^eb^tiādimāha. Itaro taṃ vidhānaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Sesavāresupi eseva nayo.
[03]Uppādakkhaṇapañhe yadi ekameva cittaṃ vimuttañca vimuccamānañca, ekasmiṃ khaṇe vimuttaṃ ekasmiṃ vimuccamānaṃ āpajjati. Kiṃ te evarūpaṃ cittanti attho.

[03]^b^367^eb^^b^.^eb^ Suttasādhane paṭhamasuttaṃ paravādissa. Tatrāssāyamadhippāyo – ^b^vimuccatī^eb^ti vippakataniddeso. Tasmā yaṃ tassa yogino evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato etehi āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccati, taṃ vimuccamānaṃ nāma hotīti. Dutiyasuttaṃ sakavādissa. Tatrāssāyamadhippāyo – yadi te vimuccatīti vacanato vimuttaṃ vimuccamānaṃ, idha vimuccatīti vacanābhāvato vimuttameva siyā, na vimuccamānanti.

[03]Idāni ‘‘yathā te vippakatavimuttitāya vimuccamānaṃ, kiṃ evaṃ vippakatarāgāditāya rajjamānādīnipi atthī’’ti codanatthaṃ puna ^b^atthi citta^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Paravādināpi tathārūpaṃ cittaṃ apassantena sabbaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ. Atha naṃ sakavādī ‘‘dveyeva koṭiyo, tatiyā natthī’’ti anubodhento ^b^nanu rattañceva arattañcā^eb^tiādimāha. Tassattho – nanu bhadramukha, rāgasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ rattaṃ vippayuttaṃ arattanti dveva koṭiyo, rajjamānaṃ nāma tatiyā koṭi natthīti? Duṭṭhādīsupi eseva nayo. Atha naṃ āmantāti paṭijānitvā ṭhitaṃ. Vimuttipakkhepi dveyeva ^a^V0.0167^ea^ koṭiyo dassetuṃ ^b^hañci rattañcevā^eb^tiādimāha. Tassattho – yadi etā dve koṭiyo sampaṭicchasi, avimuttañceva vimuttañcā ti imāpi sampaṭiccha. Kilesasampayuttañhi cittaṃ avimuttaṃ, vippayuttaṃ vimuttaṃ. Vimuccamānaṃ nāmāti paramatthato tatiyā koṭi natthīti.
[06]Vimuccamānakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^368^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0068^ea^^a^M0.0172^ea^ aṭṭhamakakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ anulomagotrabhumaggakkhaṇe kilesānaṃ samudācārābhāvato aṭṭhamakassa sotāpattimaggaṭṭhapuggalassa dve pariyuṭṭhānā pahīnāti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānañceva sammitiyānañca; tesaṃ aññataraṃ sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, maggakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya diṭṭhiyā anuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa. Tato yasmā diṭṭhi nāmesā sotāpannasseva pahīnā, na maggaṭṭhassa, tasmā ^b^aṭṭhamako puggalo sotāpanno^eb^ti anuyogo sakavādissa. Vicikicchāpañhepi eseva nayo. Anusayapañhe pariyuṭṭhānato añño anusayoti tesaṃ laddhi, tasmā ‘‘na heva’’nti paṭikkhittaṃ.
[03]Sīlabbataparāmāsapañhepi sīlabbataparāmāsapariyuṭṭhānanti vohāraṃ na passati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Pariyuṭṭhānamevassa pahīnanti laddhi.

[03]^b^369^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Maggo bhāvito^eb^ti pañhe tasmiṃ khaṇe bhāveti, na bhāvito. Tasmā paṭikkhipati. ^b^Amaggenā^eb^tiādianuyoge paṭhamamaggeneva pahīnabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Yadi hi amaggena pahīyetha, gotrabhupuggalādīnampi pahīyethāti āpajjanato. ^b^Uppajjissatī^eb^ti pucchā paravādissa, vissajjanaṃ sakavādissa. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Aṭṭhamakakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^371^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0168^ea^ aṭṭhamakassa indriyakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘aṭṭhamako maggakkhaṇe indriyāni paṭilabhati nāma, no cassa paṭiladdhāni hontī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^natthi saddhindriya^eb^nti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Natthi saddhā^eb^ti puṭṭho pana saddhindriyato saddhāya nānattaṃ sallakkhetvā paṭikkhipati. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Yathā pana yassa atthi mano, tassa manindriyampi atthi; evaṃ yassa ^a^M0.0173^ea^ saddhādayo atthi, tassa atthi saddhindriyādīnipīti dīpanatthaṃ ^a^P0.0069^ea^^b^atthi mano atthi manindriya^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthameva saddhiṃ suttasādhanenāti.
[06]Aṭṭhamakassa indriyakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^373^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni dibbacakkhukathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ catutthajjhānadhammūpatthaddhaṃ maṃsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhu nāma hotīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānañceva sammitiyānañca; te sandhāya ^b^maṃsacakkhu^eb^nti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
[03]Puna ‘‘maṃsacakkhu dibbacakkhu, dibbacakkhu maṃsacakkhū’’ti puṭṭho taṃ mattameva taṃ na hotīti paṭikkhipati. ^b^Yādisa^eb^ntiādipucchāsupi ubhinnaṃ ekasabhāvābhāveneva paṭikkhipati.

[03]^b^Visayo^eb^tiādīsu ubhinnampi rūpāyatanameva visayo. Maṃsacakkhu pana āpāthagatameva passati. Itaraṃ anāpāthagataṃ tiropabbatādigatampi. Dibbacakkhussa ca atisukhumampi rūpaṃ gocaro, na tādisaṃ itarassāti evametesaṃ ānubhāvagocarā asadisā.

[03]^b^Upādiṇṇaṃ hutvā anupādiṇṇaṃ hotī^eb^ti puṭṭho yasmā maṃsacakkhu upādiṇṇaṃ, dibbacakkhu anupādiṇṇaṃ, na ca maṃsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhūti icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yasmā ^a^V0.0169^ea^ ‘‘maṃsacakkhussa uppādo, maggo dibbassa cakkhuno’’ti vacanaṃ nissāya maṃsacakkhupaccayā dibbacakkhu uppajjati, tañca rūpāvacarikānaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ pasādoti icchati, tasmā paṭijānāti. ^b^Kāmāvacaraṃ hutvā^eb^ti puṭṭhopi yasmā na maṃsacakkhumeva dibbacakkhūti icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho rūpāvacarajjhānapaccayena uppannattā rūpāvacaraṃ nāma jātanti paṭijānāti.

[03]^b^Rūpāvacaraṃ hutvā arūpāvacara^eb^nti puṭṭhopi tato paraṃ bhāvanāya arūpāvacarakkhaṇe rūpāvacaracittassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho arūpāvacarikānaṃ ^a^M0.0174^ea^ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ pasādo hutvā uppajjatīti laddhiyā ^a^P0.0070^ea^ paṭijānāti. Apariyāpannabhāvaṃ panassa na icchati, tasmā paṭikkhipatiyeva.

[03]^b^374^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dibbacakkhuṃ dhammupatthaddha^eb^nti kāmāvacaradhammena upatthambhitaṃ hutvā. Puna ^b^dhammupatthaddha^eb^nti lokuttaradhammena upatthaddhaṃ. ^b^Dveva cakkhūnī^eb^ti puṭṭho kiñcāpi dibbacakkhuno dhammupatthaddhassa paññācakkhubhāvaṃ na icchati, paññācakkhussa pana atthitāya paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho maṃsacakkhu dhammupatthaddhaṃ dibbacakkhu hotīti laddhivasena paṭijānāti. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Dibbacakkhukathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^375^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni dibbasotakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ^b^ekaṃyeva sota^eb^nti puṭṭho dvinnaṃ atthitāya paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho yasmā tadeva dhammupatthaddhaṃ dibbasotaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā paṭijānāti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
[06]Dibbasotakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^377^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0170^ea^ yathākammūpagatañāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena…pe… yathākammūpage satte pajānātī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.246; paṭi. ma. 1.106) suttaṃ ayoniso gahetvā yathākammūpagatañāṇameva dibbacakkhunti laddhi, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Puna ^b^yathākammūpagatañca manasi karotī^eb^ti puṭṭho ekacittassa ārammaṇadvayābhāvā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho nānācittavasena paṭijānāti. Puna lesokāsaṃ adatvā ^b^dvinnaṃ phassāna^eb^nti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati. Iti yathā iminā yathākammūpagatapadena, evameva ^b^ime vata bhonto^eb^^a^P0.0071^ea^, ^b^sattā^eb^tiādipadehipi saddhiṃ yojanāsu attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^378^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āyasmā^eb^^a^M0.0175^ea^^b^sāriputto yathākammūpagataṃ ñāṇaṃ jānātī^eb^ti idaṃ sakavādī yasmā thero appicchatāya abhiññāñāṇāni na vaḷañjetīti ekacce na jānanti, tāni panassa neva atthīti maññanti, tasmā taṃ ‘‘dibbacakkhuno alābhī thero’’ti maññamānaṃ pucchati. Teneva kāraṇena ‘‘atthāyasmato sāriputtassa dibbacakkhū’’ti parato puṭṭho paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yaṃkiñci sāvakena pattabbaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ therena anuppattanti paṭijānāti. Idānissa vikkhepaṃ karonto sakavādī ^b^nanu āyasmā sāriputto^eb^tiādimāha. Imañhi gāthaṃ thero vaḷañjanapaṇidhiyā eva abhāvena āha, na abhiññāñāṇassa abhāvena. Paravādī pana abhāvenevāti atthaṃ sallakkheti. Tasmā tassa laddhiyā therassa yathākammūpagatañāṇameva atthi, no dibbacakkhu. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘tena hi na vattabbaṃ yathākammūpagatañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhū’’ti.
[06]Yathākammūpagatañāṇakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^379^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni saṃvarakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ tāvatiṃse deve upādāya tatuttari devesu yasmā te pañca verāni na samācaranti, tasmā saṃvaro atthīti laddhi, te sandhāya pucchā ^a^V0.0171^ea^ sakavādissa, verasamudācāraṃ apassato paṭiññā itarassa. Tato yasmā saṃvaro nāma saṃvaritabbe asaṃvare sati hoti, tasmā asaṃvarapucchā sakavādissa, devesu pāṇātipātādīnaṃ abhāvena paṭikkhepo itarassa.
[03]^b^Atthi manussesū^eb^tiādi saṃvare sati asaṃvarassa asaṃvare ca sati saṃvarassa pavattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^380^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī^eb^ti ādipañhesu pāṇātipātādīnaṃ asamācaraṇavasena paṭiññā, pāṇātipātādīnaṃ natthitāya paṭikkhepo veditabbo. Paṭilomapañhā uttānatthāyeva.

[03]Avasāne ^b^natthi devesu saṃvaro^eb^tipañhe ^a^P0.0072^ea^ pāṇātipātādīni katvā puna tato saṃvarābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. Tato chalavasena ^a^M0.0176^ea^ yadi saṃvaro natthi, sabbe devā pāṇātipātinotiādipucchā paravādissa. Devānaṃ verasamudācārassa abhāvena paṭikkhepo sakavādissa. ^b^Naheva^eb^nti vacanamattaṃ gahetvā laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṃ paravādissa. Evaṃ patiṭṭhitā pana laddhi appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
[06]Saṃvarakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^381^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni asaññakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa’’nti vacanato vinā viññāṇena paṭisandhi nāma natthi. ‘‘Saññuppādā ca pana te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī’’ti vacanato asaññasattānampi cutipaṭisandhikkhaṇe saññā atthīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Tato naṃ sakavādī ‘‘kiṃ te taṃ ṭhānaṃ saññābhavo’’tiādīhi codetuṃ ^b^saññābhavo saññāgatī^eb^tiādimāha. Taṃ sabbaṃ tato parañca pāḷinayeneva veditabbanti.
[06]Asaññakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^384^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0172^ea^ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘nevasaññānāsaññāyatana’’nti vacanato na vattabbaṃ ‘‘tasmiṃ bhave saññā atthī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha sabbaṃ pāḷinayeneva veditabbanti.
[06]Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Tatiyo vaggo.

[03]^b^387^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0177^ea^^a^P0.0073^ea^ gihissa arahāti kathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ yasakulaputtādīnaṃ gihibyañjane ṭhitānaṃ arahattappattiṃ disvā ‘‘gihi assa arahā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha ^b^gihissā^eb^ti yo gihisaṃyojanasampayuttatāya gihi, so arahaṃ assāti attho. Paravādī pana adhippāyaṃ asallakkhetvā gihibyañjanamattameva passanto paṭijānāti. Idānissa ‘‘gihi nāma gihisaṃyojanena hoti, na byañjanamattena. Yathāha bhagavā –
[21]‘Alaṅkato cepi samaṃ careyya,
[27]Santo danto niyato brahmacārī;
[26]Sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ,
[22]So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū’’’ti. (dha. pa. 142);
[03]Imaṃ ^a^V0.0173^ea^ nayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^atthi arahato^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Gihissa arahātikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^388^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni upapattikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘opapātiko hoti tatthaparinibbāyī’’tivacanāni (pu. pa. 35-40) ayoniso gahetvā suddhāvāsesu upapattiyā arahāti laddhi, ‘‘yesaṃ vā upahaccaparinibbāyī’’ti ^a^P0.0074^ea^ padaṃ parivattitvā ‘‘upapajjaparinibbāyī’’ti pariyāpuṇantānaṃ saha upapattiyā arahā hotīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Tattha yasmā upapatticittaṃ nāma lokiyaṃ, tena sotāpannādayopi na honti, pageva arahā. Tasmāssa ^a^M0.0178^ea^ imaṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^saha upapattiyā sotāpanno^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ.
[03]^b^389^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sāriputto^eb^tiādi imesu mahātheresu ko ekopi saha upapattiyā arahā nāmāti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^390^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upapattesiyenā^eb^ti paṭisandhicittena. Tañhi upapattiṃ esati gavesati, tasmā upapattesiyanti vuccati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Upapattikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^391^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni anāsavakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ye dhammā anāsavassa arahato, sabbe te ^a^V0.0174^ea^ anāsavāti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^arahato^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ anāsavā nāma maggādayo, kiṃ tassa teyeva uppajjantīti codanatthaṃ ^b^maggo phala^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Cakkhu anāsava^eb^nti puṭṭho tassa sāsavattā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho anāsavassetanti paṭijānāti.

[03]^b^392^eb^^b^.^eb^ Cīvarapañhe ekova dhammo anāsavo sāsavo ca hotīti lakkhaṇavirodhabhayā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho anāsavassa hutvā sāsavassa hotīti paṭijānāti. ^b^Taññeva anāsava^eb^nti pañhādvayepi eseva nayo. Sakavādī pana ^b^taññevā^eb^ti anuññātattā ‘‘maggo anāsavo hutvā’’tiādīhi codeti. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabboti.
[06]Anāsavakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^393^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0179^ea^^a^P0.0075^ea^ samannāgatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha dve samannāgamā paccuppannakkhaṇe samaṅgībhāvasamannāgamo ca rūpāvacarādīsu aññatarabhūmippattito paṭilābhasamannāgamo ca. So yāva adhigatavisesā na parihāyati, tāvadeva labbhati. Yesaṃ pana ṭhapetvā ime dve samannāgame añño upapattidhammavasena eko samannāgamo nāma hotīti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃ, tesaṃ pattidhammo nāma koci natthīti anubodhanatthaṃ ^b^arahā catūhi phalehi samannāgato^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, pattiṃ sandhāya paṭiññā itarassa. Athassa ‘‘yadi te arahā catūhi khandhehi viya catūhi phalehi samannāgato, evaṃ sante ye catūsu phalesu cattāro phassādayo, tehi te arahato samannāgatatā pāpuṇātī’’ti codanatthaṃ ^b^arahā catūhi phassehī^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ paravādinā ekakkhaṇe catunnaṃ phassādīnaṃ abhāvā paṭikkhittaṃ. Anāgāmipañhādīsupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^395^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sotāpattiphalaṃ vītivatto^eb^ti na paṭhamajjhānaṃ viya dutiyajjhānalābhī; puna anuppattiyā ^a^V0.0175^ea^ pana vītivattoti pucchati. ^b^Sotāpattimagga^eb^ntiādi yaṃ vītivatto, tenassa puna asamannāgamaṃ dassetuṃ āraddhaṃ.

[03]^b^396^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tehi ca aparihīno^eb^ti pañhe yasmā yathā paccanīkasamudācārena lokiyajjhānadhammā parihāyanti, na evaṃ lokuttarā. Maggena hi ye kilesā pahīyanti, phalena ca paṭippassambhanti, te tathā pahīnāva tathā paṭippassaddhāyeva ca honti, tasmā sakavādinā āmantāti paṭiññātaṃ. Svāyamattho parato ‘‘arahatā cattāro maggā paṭiladdhā’’tiādīsu pakāsitoyeva. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Samannāgatakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^397^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Arahā^eb^^a^M0.0180^ea^^b^chahi upekkhāhī^eb^ti kathāyapi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Arahā hi chasu dvāresu upekkhānaṃ uppattibhabbatāya ^a^P0.0076^ea^ tāhi samannāgatoti vuccati, na ekakkhaṇe sabbāsaṃ uppattibhāvenāti.
[06]Upekkhāsamannāgatakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^398^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^b^bodhiyā buddho^eb^tikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ^b^bodhī^eb^ti catumaggañāṇassāpi sabbaññutaññāṇassāpi adhivacanaṃ. Tasmā yesaṃ yathā odātena vaṇṇena odāto, sāmena vaṇṇena sāmo, evaṃ bodhiyā buddhoti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃyeva; te sandhāya pucchā ca anuyogo ca sakavādissa, paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca itarassa.

[03]^b^Atītāyā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0176^ea^ pañhe tasmiṃ khaṇe abhāvato paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho paṭilābhaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Puna kiccavasena puṭṭho kiccābhāvato paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yaṃ tena tāya karaṇīyaṃ kataṃ, tattha sammohābhāvaṃ paṭijānāti. Lesokāsaṃ pana adatvā ^b^dukkhaṃ parijānātī^eb^tiādinā nayena puṭṭho tassa kiccassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.

[03]Anāgatapañhe tasmiṃ khaṇe maggañāṇassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho ‘‘agamā rājagahaṃ buddho’’ti (su. ni. 410) anāgatāya bodhiyā buddhabhāvaṃ maññamāno paṭijānāti. ^b^Bodhikaraṇīyaṃ karotī^eb^ti puṭṭho tasmiṃ khaṇe kiccābhāvena paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho yadi na kareyya, buddhoti na vucceyya. Yasmā avassaṃ karissati, tasmā karotiyeva nāmāti paṭijānāti. Puna lesokāsaṃ adatvā puṭṭho paṭikkhipati. Paccuppannapañho saddhiṃ saṃsandanāya uttānatthova.

[03]^b^399^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tisso bodhiyo ekato katvā puṭṭho sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sandhāya tīhipi buddhoti vattabbabhāvato paṭijānāti. Puna tīhiti puṭṭho sabbāsaṃ ^a^M0.0181^ea^ ekakkhaṇe abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho atītānāgatapaccuppannassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa vasena paṭijānāti. Puna lesokāsaṃ adatvā satataṃ samitanti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.

[03]^b^Na battabbaṃ bodhiyā^eb^ti pucchā paravādissa, bodhiyā abhāvakkhaṇe abuddhabhāvāpattito paṭiññā sakavādissa. ^b^Nanu bodhipaṭilābhā^eb^ti pañhe pana yasmiṃ santāne bodhisaṅkhātaṃ ^a^P0.0077^ea^ maggañāṇaṃ uppannaṃ, tattha buddhoti sammutisabbhāvato paṭiññā tasseva. Tassa adhippāyaṃ ajānitvā hañcīti laddhiṭṭhapanā paravādissa. Idānissa asallakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ ^b^bodhipaṭilābhā buddhoti bodhiyā buddho^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa. Tassattho – ‘‘kiṃ te yasmā bodhipaṭilābhā buddho, tasmā bodhiyā buddho’’ti. Itaro ‘‘bodhipaṭilābho nāma bodhiyā uppajjitvā niruddhāyapi santāne uppannabhāvoyeva. Bodhi nāma maggakkhaṇe ñāṇa’’nti imaṃ vibhāgaṃ asallakkhentova puna paṭijānāti. Tato sakavādinā ^b^bodhipaṭilābhā bodhī^eb^ti puṭṭho vacanokāsaṃ alabhanto paṭikkhipatīti.
[06]Bodhiyābuddhotikathāvaṇṇanā.
[03]Iti imā tissopi kathā uttarāpathakānaṃyeva.

[03]^b^400^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0177^ea^ lakkhaṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavantī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.258) imaṃ suttaṃ ayoniso gahetvā lakkhaṇasamannāgato bodhisattova hotīti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
[03]^b^Cakkavattisatto^eb^ti pañhesu yasmā cakkavattī sattopi ca bodhisattopi, tasmā abodhisattaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Bodhisattaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
[03]^b^402^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dvattiṃsimānī^eb^tisuttaṃ ^a^M0.0182^ea^ bodhisattameva sandhāya vuttaṃ. So hi pacchime bhave buddho hoti, itaresu cakkavattī, tasmā ābhatampi anābhatasadisamevāti.
[06]Lakkhaṇakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^403^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0078^ea^ niyāmokkantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ghaṭikārasutte jotipālassa pabbajjaṃ sandhāya ‘‘bodhisatto kassapabhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^bodhisatto^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, laddhiyaṃ ṭhatvā paṭiññā itarassa. Tato yasmā niyāmoti vā brahmacariyanti vā ariyamaggassa nāmaṃ, bodhisattānañca ṭhapetvā pāramīpūraṇaṃ aññā niyāmokkanti nāma natthi. Yadi bhaveyya, bodhisatto sotāpanno sāvako bhaveyya. Na cetamevaṃ. Kevalañhi naṃ buddhā attano ñāṇabale ṭhatvā – ‘‘ayaṃ buddho bhavissatī’’ti byākaronti, tasmā puna ^b^bodhisatto^eb^ti anuyogo sakavādissa. Pacchimabhavaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhepo itarassa. Dutiyapañhe jotipālakālaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā tasseva. ^b^Sāvako hutvā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Anussaviyo^eb^ti ^a^V0.0178^ea^ anussavena paṭividdhadhammo. Pacchimabhavaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā jotipālakāle anussavaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.

[03]^b^404^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aññaṃ satthāra^eb^ntiāḷārañca rāmaputtañca sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Āyasmā ānando^eb^tiādi ‘‘okkantaniyāmāva sāvakā honti, na itare okkantaniyāmā evarūpā hontī’’ti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^Sāvako jātiṃ vītivatto^eb^ti yāya jātiyā sāvako, taṃ vītivatto aññasmiṃ bhave asāvako hotīti pucchati. Itaro sotāpannādīnaṃ sotāpannādisāvakabhāvato paṭikkhipati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Niyāmokkantikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^406^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0183^ea^ aparāpi samannāgatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘catutthamaggaṭṭho puggalo pattidhammavasena tīhi phalehi samannāgato’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ ^a^P0.0079^ea^; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha heṭṭhā catūhi phalehi samannāgatakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
[06]Aparāpi samannāgatakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^413^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni saṃyojanappahānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘nippariyāyeneva sabbasaṃyojanappahānaṃ ^a^V0.0179^ea^ arahatta’’nti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Puna ^b^sabbe saṃyojanā^eb^ti puṭṭho heṭṭhā vuttamaggattayena pahīne sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho tena maggena appahīnassa abhāvā paṭijānāti. ^b^Sakkāyadiṭṭhi^eb^ādīsupi paṭhamamaggena pahīnabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, catutthamaggena anavasesappahānaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Eseva nayo sabbatthāti.
[06]Sabbasaṃyojanappahānakathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Catuttho vaggo.

[03]^b^418^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0080^ea^ vimuttikathā nāma hoti. Tattha vipassanā, maggo, phalaṃ, paccavekkhaṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vimuttiñāṇanti nāmaṃ. Tesu vipassanāñāṇaṃ niccanimittādīhi vimuttattā, tadaṅgavimuttibhāvena vā vimuttattā vimuttiñāṇaṃ. Maggo ^a^M0.0184^ea^ samucchedavimutti, phalaṃ paṭippassaddhivimutti, paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ pana vimuttiṃ jānātīti ^b^vimuttiñāṇaṃ^eb^. Evaṃ catubbidhe vimuttiñāṇe nippariyāyena phalañāṇameva vimutti. Sesāni ‘‘vimuttānī’’ti vā ‘‘avimuttānī’’ti vā na vattabbāni. Tasmā ‘‘idaṃ nāma vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimutta’’nti avatvā aviseseneva ‘‘vimuttiñāṇaṃ vimutta’’nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa. Puna ^b^yaṃkiñcī^eb^ti puṭṭho paccavekkhaṇādīni sandhāya paṭikkhipati. ^b^Paṭipannassā^eb^ti puṭṭho maggañāṇassa anāsavataṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Yasmā pana taṃ sotāpannassa phale ṭhitassa ñāṇaṃ na hoti, tasmā vimuttaṃ nāma na hotīti codanatthaṃ puna sakavādī ^b^sotāpannassā^eb^tiādimāha. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
[06]Vimuttikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^421^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0180^ea^ asekhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā ānandattherādayo sekhā ‘‘uḷāro bhagavā’’tiādinā nayena asekhe jānanti, tasmā ^a^P0.0081^ea^ ‘‘sekhassa asekhañāṇaṃ atthī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Jānāti passatī^eb^ti idaṃ attanā adhigatassa jānanavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Gotrabhuno^eb^tiādi heṭṭhimāya bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa uparūpariñāṇassa abhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Nanu āyasmā ānando sekho ‘‘uḷāro bhagavā’’ti jānātī^eb^ti paravādī asekhe bhagavati pavattattā taṃ asekhañāṇanti icchati, na panetaṃ asekhaṃ. Tasmā evaṃ patiṭṭhāpitāpi laddhi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
[06]Asekhañāṇakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^424^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni viparītakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yvāyaṃ pathavīkasiṇe pathavīsaññī samāpajjati, tassa taṃ ñāṇaṃ viparītañāṇa’’nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ^a^M0.0185^ea^ andhakānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Pathaviṃ nissāya uppannanimittañhi na pathavīyeva, tatra cāyaṃ pathavīsaññī. Tasmā viparītañāṇanti ayametassa adhippāyo. Tato sakavādī ‘‘lakkhaṇapathavīpi sasambhārapathavīpi nimittapathavīpi pathavīdevatāpi sabbā pathavīyeva, tāsu pathavīti ñāṇaṃ viparītaṃ na hoti. Anicce niccantiādivipariyeso pana viparītañāṇaṃ nāma. Kiṃ te idaṃ etesu aññatara’’nti codetuṃ ^b^anicce nicca^eb^ntiādimāha. Itaro vipallāsalakkhaṇābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, pathavīnimittaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.

[03]^b^Kusala^eb^nti sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ ñāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Atthi arahato^eb^ti pañhesupi vipallāsalakkhaṇābhāvena paṭikkhipati. Pathavīnimittaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Sabbeva pathavī^eb^ti sabbaṃ taṃ pathavīkasiṇaṃ lakkhaṇapathavīyeva ^a^P0.0082^ea^ hotīti pucchati. Sakavādī tathā abhāvato paṭikkhipati. ^b^Nanu pathavī atthi, atthi ca koci pathaviṃ pathavito samāpajjatī^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa ^a^V0.0181^ea^. Tassattho – nanu nimittapathavī atthi, atthi ca koci taṃ pathaviṃ pathavitoyeva samāpajjati, na āpato vā tejato vāti. ^b^Pathavī atthī^eb^tiādi ‘‘yadi yaṃ yathā atthi, taṃ tathā samāpajjantassa ñāṇaṃ viparītaṃ hoti, nibbānaṃ atthi, tampi samāpajjantassa sabbavipariyesasamugghātanaṃ maggañāṇampi te viparītaṃ hotū’’ti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti.
[06]Viparītakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^428-431^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni niyāmakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yo puggalo sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamissati, taṃ ‘‘bhabbo esa dhammaṃ abhisametu’’nti yasmā bhagavā jānāti, tasmā ‘‘aniyatassa puthujjanasseva sato puggalassa niyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṃ atthī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^aniyatassā^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha ^b^niyāmagamanāyā^eb^ti niyāmo vuccati maggo, maggagamanāya maggokkamanāyāti attho. Yaṃ panassa ñāṇaṃ disvā bhagavā ‘‘bhabbo aya’’nti jānāti, taṃ sandhāya paṭiññā paravādissa.

[03]Athassa ^a^M0.0186^ea^ sakavādī ayuttavāditaṃ dīpetuṃ ^b^niyatassā^eb^ti viparītānuyogamāha. Tattha paṭhamapañhe maggena niyatassa aniyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṃ nāma natthīti paṭikkhipati. Dutiye natthibhāvena paṭijānāti. Tatiye aniyatassa natthīti puṭṭhattā laddhivirodhena paṭikkhipati. Puna paṭhamapañhameva catutthaṃ katvā niyatassa niyāmagamanādivasena tayo pañhā katā. Tesu paṭhame yasmā ādimaggena niyatassa puna tadatthāya ñāṇaṃ natthi, tasmā paṭikkhipati. Dutiye ^a^P0.0083^ea^ natthibhāveneva paṭijānāti. Tatiye laddhivirodheneva paṭikkhipati. Puna paṭhamapañhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ katvā aniyatassa aniyāmagamanādivasena tayo pañhā katā. Tesaṃ attho vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Puna paṭhamapañhameva dvādasamaṃ katvā taṃmūlakā ^b^atthi niyāmo^eb^tiādayo pañhā katā. Tattha yasmā niyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṃ nāma maggañāṇameva hoti, tasmā taṃ sandhāya ^b^atthi niyāmo^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Itaro pana niyāmoti vutte paṭikkhipati, ñāṇanti vutte paṭijānāti. ^b^Satipaṭṭhānā^eb^dīsupi ^a^V0.0182^ea^ eseva nayo. Paccanīkaṃ uttānatthameva. ^b^Gotrabhuno^eb^tiādi yena yaṃ appattaṃ, tassa taṃ natthīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Bhagavā jānātī^eb^ti attano ñāṇabalena jānāti, na tassa niyāmagamanañāṇasabbhāvato. Tasmā iminā kāraṇena patiṭṭhitāpissa laddhi appatiṭṭhitāyevāti.
[06]Niyāmakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^432-433^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni paṭisambhidākathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘yaṃkiñci ariyānaṃ ñāṇaṃ, sabbaṃ lokuttaramevā’’ti gahetvā ‘‘sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭisambhidā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Sammutiñāṇa^eb^pañhesu pathavīkasiṇasammutiyaṃ samāpattiñāṇaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, niruttiñāṇaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Ye keci sammutinti pañhe puthujjane sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Cetopariyāyapañhesu puthujjanassa ñāṇaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, ariyassa ñāṇaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Sabbā paññā^eb^tipañhesu kasiṇasamāpattipañhaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, lokuttaraṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Pathavīkasiṇasamāpatti^eb^ntiādi ‘‘yā etesu ettakesu ṭhānesu paññā, kiṃ sabbā sā paṭisambhidā’’ti pucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Tena^eb^^a^M0.0187^ea^^b^hi sabbaṃ ñāṇa^eb^nti yasmā sabbā lokuttarapaññā paṭisambhidā ^a^P0.0084^ea^, tasmā sabbanti vacanaṃ sāmaññaphalena saddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetīti.
[06]Paṭisambhidākathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^434-435^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni sammutiñāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha sammutisaccaṃ paramatthasaccanti dve ^a^V0.0183^ea^ saccāni. Ye pana evaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā saccanti vacanasāmaññena sammutiñāṇampi ‘‘saccārammaṇamevā’’ti vadanti, seyyathāpi andhakā; te ayuttavādinoti tesaṃ vādavisodhanatthaṃ ayaṃ kathā āraddhā. Tattha ^b^na vattabba^eb^nti pucchā paravādissa, paramatthasaccaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. ^b^Sammutisaccamhī^eb^ti sammutiṃ anupaviṭṭhe saccamhi. Paccatte vā bhummavacanaṃ, sammutisaccanti attho. ^b^Sammutiñāṇaṃ saccārammaṇaññevā^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Tato naṃ ‘‘yadi taṃ avisesena saccārammaṇaññeva, tena ñāṇena dukkhapariññādīni kareyyā’’ti codetuṃ ^b^tena ñāṇenā^eb^tiādimāha.
[06]Sammutiñāṇakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^436-438^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni cittārammaṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha cetopariyāye ñāṇanti vacanamattameva gahetvā ‘‘taṃ ñāṇaṃ cittārammaṇamevā’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Athassa ‘‘yo sarāgādivasena cittaṃ jānāti, tassa rāgādayopi ārammaṇā honti, tasmā na vattabbaṃ taṃ cittārammaṇaññevā’’ti codanatthaṃ ^b^nanu atthi kocī^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Phassārammaṇe^eb^ti ^a^P0.0085^ea^ phassasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe. ^b^Vedanārammaṇe^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Puna ^b^phassārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ na vattabba^eb^nti puṭṭho phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ ^a^M0.0188^ea^ manasikaroto phassovārammaṇaṃ hotīti paṭijānāti. ^b^Kiṃ panetaṃ phassapariyāye ñāṇa^eb^nti puṭṭho pana tādisassa suttapadassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Idāni yaṃ nissāya laddhi, tadeva dassetvā laddhiṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ ^b^nanu cetopariyāye ñāṇa^eb^ntiādimāha. Sā panesā vacanamattābhinivesena patiṭṭhāpitāpi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
[06]Cittārammaṇakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^439-440^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0184^ea^ anāgatañāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha anāgataṃ nāma antarampi atthi, anantarampi. Tesu anantare ekanteneva ñāṇaṃ natthi. Yathā ca anantare, tathā ekavīthiekajavanapariyāpannepi. Tattha ye sabbasmimpi anāgate ñāṇaṃ icchanti, seyyathāpi andhakā; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yaṃ te anāgate ñāṇaṃ, kiṃ tena anantaraṃ anāgataṃ mūlādivasena jānātī’’ti codetuṃ ^b^anāgataṃ mūlato^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^mūlato^eb^tiādīni sabbāni kāraṇavevacanāneva. Kāraṇañhi yaṃ attano phalaṃ karoti, taṃ tattha mūlayati patiṭṭhātīti ^b^mūlaṃ^eb^. Tato ca taṃ hinoti pavattayatīti ^b^hetu^eb^. Tadeva taṃ nideti ‘‘handa naṃ gaṇhathā’’ti. Niyyāteti viyāti ^b^nidānaṃ^eb^. Tato taṃ sambhavatīti ^b^sambhavo^eb^. Pabhavatīti ^b^pabhavo^eb^. Tattha ca taṃ samuṭṭhāti, taṃ vā naṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti ^b^samuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Tadeva naṃ āharatīti ^b^āhāro^eb^. Tañcassa apariccajitabbaṭṭhena ^b^ārammaṇaṃ^eb^. Tadeva cetaṃ paṭicca etīti ^b^paccayo^eb^. Tato naṃ samudetīti ^b^samudayo^eb^ti vuccati. Yasmā ^a^P0.0086^ea^ pana anantaraṃ cittaṃ etehākārehi na sakkā jānituṃ, tasmā ^b^na heva^eb^nti paṭikkhipati. ^b^Anāgataṃ hetupaccayata^eb^nti yā anantarānāgate citte hetupaccayatā, taṃ jānāti. Ye tattha dhammā hetupaccayā honti, te jānātīti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^Gotrabhuno^eb^tiādi yasmiṃ anāgate ñāṇaṃ na uppajjati, taṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Pāṭaliputtassā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0189^ea^ suttaṃ yasmiṃ anāgate ñāṇaṃ uppajjati, taṃ dassetuṃ āhaṭaṃ. Yasmā panetaṃ na sabbasmiṃ anāgate ñāṇassa sādhakaṃ; tasmā anāhaṭamevāti.
[06]Anāgatañāṇakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^441-442^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni paṭuppannañāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccato diṭṭhesu tampi ñāṇaṃ aniccato diṭṭhaṃ hotī’’ti vacanaṃ nissāya ‘‘avisesena sabbasmiṃ paccuppanne ñāṇaṃ atthī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^paṭuppanne^eb^ti pucchā ^a^V0.0185^ea^ sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yadi avisesena paṭuppanne ñāṇaṃ atthi, khaṇapaccuppannepi tena bhavitabbaṃ. Evaṃ sante dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ekato abhāvā teneva ñāṇena taṃ jānitabbaṃ hotī’’ti codanatthaṃ ^b^tenā^eb^ti anuyogo sakavādissa. Tattha paṭhamapañhe teneva taṃ jānituṃ na sakkāti paṭikkhepo itarassa. Dutiyapañhe santatiṃ sandhāya paṭiññā tasseva. Paṭipāṭito bhaṅgaṃ passanto bhaṅgānupassaneneva bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ passatīti adhippāyo. ^b^Tena ñāṇena taṃ ñāṇaṃ jānātī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Tena phassena taṃ phassa^eb^ntiādīnissa lesokāsanivāraṇatthaṃ vuttāni ^a^P0.0087^ea^. Yaṃ panetena laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ^b^nanu sabbasaṅkhāre^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha nayato taṃ ñāṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ hoti, na ārammaṇatoti adhippāyena paṭiññā sakavādissa. Tasmā evaṃ patiṭṭhitāpissa laddhi appatiṭṭhitāva hoti.
[06]Paṭuppannañāṇakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^443-444^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni phale ñāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘buddhāpi sattānaṃ ariyaphalappattiyā dhammaṃ desenti sāvakāpi, iti iminā sāmaññena ^a^M0.0190^ea^ buddhānaṃ viya sāvakānampi tena tena sattena pattabbe phale ñāṇaṃ atthī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^sāvakassā^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yadi sāvakassa phale ñāṇaṃ atthi, yathā buddhā samānepi sotāpattiphale attano ñāṇabalena ‘ayaṃ ekabījī, ayaṃ kolaṃkolo, ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo’ti phalassakataṃ paññapenti, kiṃ te evaṃ sāvakopī’’ti codetuṃ ^b^sāvako phalassa kataṃ paññapetī^eb^ti āha. Itaro paṭikkhipati.

[03]^b^Atthi sāvakassa phalaparopariyattī^eb^tiādi phale ñāṇassa atthitāya paccayapucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha adhippāyo – buddhānaṃ ‘‘idaṃ phalaṃ paraṃ, idaṃ opara’’nti evaṃ phalānaṃ uccāvacabhāvajānanasaṅkhātā phale paropariyatti nāma atthi. Tathā indriyapuggalaparopariyattiyo, tāsaṃ ^a^V0.0186^ea^ atthitāya tassa tassa puggalassa tesaṃ tesaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena taṃ taṃ phalaṃ jānanti, kiṃ te sāvakassāpi etā paropariyattiyo atthīti.

[03]^b^Atthi sāvakassa khandhapaññattī^eb^tiādīnipi ‘‘yadi te sāvakassa buddhānaṃ viya phale ñāṇaṃ atthi, imā hi pissa paññattīhi ^a^P0.0088^ea^ bhavitabbaṃ. Kimassa tā atthi, sakkoti so etā paññattiyo attano balena jānituṃ vā paññapetuṃ vā’’ti codanatthaṃ vuttāni. ^b^Sāvako jino^eb^tiādi ‘‘yadi sāvakassa buddhānaṃ viya phale ñāṇaṃ atthi, evaṃ sante sveva jino’’ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Sāvako anuppannassā^eb^ti pañhepi ayameva nayo. ^b^Aññāṇī^eb^ti pañhe avijjāsaṅkhātassa aññāṇassa vihatattā paṭikkhitto, na panassa buddhānaṃ viya phale ñāṇaṃ atthi. Tasmā appatiṭṭhitova paravādīvādoti.
[06]Phalañāṇakathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Pañcamo vaggo.
[06]Mahāpaṇṇāsako samatto.

[03]^b^445-447^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0191^ea^^a^P0.0089^ea^ niyāmakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ^b^niyāmo^eb^ti ‘‘bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammatta’’nti (pu. pa. 13) vacanato ariyamaggo vuccati. Yasmā pana tasmiṃ uppajjitvā niruddhepi puggalo aniyato nāma na hoti, tasmā ‘‘so niyāmo niccaṭṭhena asaṅkhato’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Tato ‘‘yadi so asaṅkhato, evarūpena tena bhavitabba’’nti dīpento ^b^nibbāna^eb^ntiādimāha. Saṃsandanapucchā uttānatthāyeva.

[03]^b^Atthi^eb^^a^V0.0187^ea^^b^kecī^eb^tiādi niyāmassa saṅkhatabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Maggo asaṅkhato^eb^tipañhe tassa uppādanirodhabhāvato paṭikkhipatīti. ^b^Niyāmo saṅkhato^eb^tipañhe niruddhepi magge niyāmassa atthitaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. ^b^Sotāpattiniyāmo^eb^tiādipañhesupi anulomato ca paṭilomato ca imināva nayena attho veditabbo. ^b^Pañca asaṅkhatānī^eb^ti puṭṭho pañcannaṃ asaṅkhatānaṃ āgataṭṭhānaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho catunnaṃ sammattaniyāmānaṃ niyāmavacanato nibbānassa ca asaṅkhatabhāvato paṭijānāti. Micchattaniyāmapañho niyāmavacanamattena asaṅkhatatāya ayuttabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttoti.
[06]Niyāmakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^448^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni paṭiccasamuppādakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ nidānavagge ‘‘uppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ anuppādā vā tathāgatānaṃ ^a^P0.0090^ea^ ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā’’tiādivacanato (saṃ. ni. 2.20) ‘‘paṭiccasamuppādo asaṅkhato’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānañca mahisāsakānañca; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.

[03]^b^449^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Avijjā^eb^^a^M0.0192^ea^^b^asaṅkhatā^eb^ti ādayo pañhā avijjādīnaṃyeva paṭiccasamuppādabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttā. Yena panatthena tattha ekekaṃ aṅgaṃ ‘‘paṭiccasamuppādo’’ti vuccati, so paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge vuttoyeva.

[03]^b^451^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti yā tattha dhammaṭṭhitatā^eb^tiādi yena suttena laddhi patiṭṭhāpitā, tasseva atthadassanena laddhibhindanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha attho – yā ayaṃ heṭṭhā ‘‘ṭhitāva sā dhātu dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā’’ti vuttā na sā aññatra avijjādīhi visuṃ ekā atthi. Avijjādīnaṃ pana paccayānaṃyevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Uppannepi hi tathāgate anuppannepi avijjāto saṅkhārā sambhavanti, saṅkhārādīhi ca viññāṇādīni, tasmā ‘‘avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā’’ti ^a^V0.0188^ea^ yā etasmiṃ pade saṅkhāradhammānaṃ kāraṇaṭṭhena ṭhitatāti dhammaṭṭhitatā. Tesaṃyeva ca dhammānaṃ kāraṇaṭṭheneva niyāmatāti dhammaniyāmatāti avijjā vuccati. Sā ca asaṅkhatā, nibbānañca asaṅkhatanti pucchati. Paravādī laddhivasena paṭijānitvā puna ^b^dve asaṅkhatānī^eb^ti puṭṭho suttābhāvena paṭikkhipitvā laddhivaseneva paṭijānāti. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Heṭṭhā vuttasadisaṃ pana tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
[06]Paṭiccasamuppādakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^452-454^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni saccakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathānī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.1090) suttaṃ nissāya ‘‘cattāri saccāni niccāni asaṅkhatānī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Ayañhissa adhippāyo – dukkhasamudayamaggesu vatthusaccaṃ saṅkhataṃ, lakkhaṇasaccaṃ ^a^P0.0091^ea^ asaṅkhataṃ. Nirodhe vatthusaccaṃ nāma natthi asaṅkhatameva tanti. Tasmā ^b^āmantā^eb^ti āha. Taṃ panassa laddhimattameva. So hi dukkhaṃ vatthusaccaṃ icchati, tathā samudayaṃ maggañca. Yāni pana nesaṃ bādhanapabhavaniyyānikalakkhaṇāni, tāni lakkhaṇasaccaṃ nāmāti, na ca bādhanalakkhaṇādīhi aññāni dukkhādīni nāma atthīti. ^b^Tāṇānī^eb^tiādīsu adhippāyo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03]^b^Dukkhasacca^eb^nti ^a^M0.0193^ea^ pañhe laddhivasena lakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Dukkha^eb^nti pañhe vatthuṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Ito paraṃ suddhikapañhā ca saṃsandanapañhā ca sabbe pāḷianusāreneva veditabbā. Avasāne laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ āhaṭasuttaṃ atthassa micchā gahitattā anāhaṭasadisamevāti.
[06]Saccakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^455-456^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0189^ea^ āruppakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘cattāro āruppā āneñjā’’ti vacanaṃ nissāya ‘‘sabbepi te dhammā asaṅkhatā’’ti laddhi, te sandhāya ^b^ākāsānañcāyatana^eb^nti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti. Sādhakasuttampi atthaṃ ajānitvā āhaṭattā anāhaṭasadisamevāti.
[06]Āruppakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^457-459^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni nirodhasamāpattikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ^b^nirodhasamāpattī^eb^ti catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ appavatti. Yasmā pana sā kariyamānā kariyati, samāpajjiyamānā samāpajjiyati, tasmā nipphannāti vuccati. Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatalakkhaṇānaṃ pana ^a^P0.0092^ea^ abhāvena na vattabbā ‘‘saṅkhatāti vā asaṅkhatā’’ti vā. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘yasmā saṅkhatā na hoti, tasmā asaṅkhatā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānañceva uttarāpathakānañca; te sandhāya ^b^nirodhasamāpattī^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Uppādentī^eb^tiādi samāpajjanapaṭilābhavaseneva vuttaṃ. Yathā pana rūpādayo asaṅkhatadhamme uppādenti; na tathā taṃ keci uppādenti nāma. ^b^Nirodhā vodānaṃ vuṭṭhāna^eb^nti phalasamāpatti veditabbā. Asaṅkhatā pana taṃ ^a^M0.0194^ea^ natthiyeva, tasmā paṭikkhipati. ^b^Tena hī^eb^ti yasmā saṅkhatā na hoti, tasmā asaṅkhatāti laddhi. Idaṃ pana asaṅkhatabhāve kāraṇaṃ na hotīti vuttampi avuttasadisamevāti.
[06]Nirodhasamāpattikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^460-462^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ākāsakathā nāma hoti. Tattha tividho ākāso – paricchedākāso ^a^V0.0190^ea^, kasiṇugghāṭimākāso, ajaṭākāso. ‘‘Tucchākāso’’tipi tasseva nāmaṃ. Tesu paricchedākāso saṅkhato, itare ^b^dve^eb^ paññattimattā. Yesaṃ pana ‘‘duvidhopi yasmā saṅkhato na hoti, tasmā asaṅkhato’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ mahisāsakānañca; te sandhāya ^b^ākāso^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Ākāsakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^463-464^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ākāso sanidassanotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ tāḷacchiddādīsu ñāṇappavattiṃ nissāya ‘‘sabbopi ajaṭākāso ^a^P0.0093^ea^ sanidassano’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ ^a^V0.0191^ea^; te sandhāya ^b^ākāso sanidassano^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yadi sanidassano, evaṃvidho bhaveyyā’’ti codanatthaṃ ^b^rūpanti^eb^ādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Cakkhuñca paṭiccā^eb^tipañhesu evarūpassa suttassa abhāvena paṭikkhipitvā tulantarikādīnaṃ upaladdhiṃ nissāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Dvinnaṃ rukkhānaṃ antara^eb^nti ettha rukkharūpaṃ cakkhunā disvā antare rūpābhāvato ākāsanti manodvāraviññāṇaṃ uppajjati, na cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Tasmā asādhakametanti.
[06]Ākāso sanidassanotikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^465-470^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0195^ea^ pathavīdhātu sanidassanātiādikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ pāsāṇaudakajālarukkhacalanānañceva pañcindriyapatiṭṭhokāsānañca vaṇṇāyatanaṃ kāyaviññattikāle hatthapādādirūpañca disvā ‘‘pathavīdhātuādayo sanidassanā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya sabbakathāsu ādipucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṃ sabbattha pāḷianusārena ceva heṭṭhā vuttanayena ca veditabbanti. ^b^Pathavīdhātu sanidassanā^eb^ti ādiṃ katvā ^b^kāyakammaṃ sanidassana^eb^nti pariyosānakathā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Chaṭṭho vaggo.

[03]^b^471-472^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0094^ea^ saṅgahitakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā dāmādīhi balibaddādayo viya keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitā nāma natthi, tasmā ‘‘natthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitā, evaṃ sante ekavidhena rūpasaṅgahotiādi niratthaka’’nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi rājagirikānañceva siddhatthikānañca; te sandhāya aññenatthena saṅgahabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa, attano laddhivasena paṭiññā itarassa. Idāni yenatthena saṅgaho labbhati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^nanu atthi keci dhammā^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthameva. Yā panesā paravādinā laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ^b^yathā dāmena vā^eb^tiādikā upamā āhaṭā, sakavādinā taṃ anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā ‘‘hañci dāmena vā’’ti tassa laddhi bhinnāti veditabbā. Ayañhettha attho – yadi te dāmādīhi balibaddādayo saṅgahitā nāma, atthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi saṅgahitāti.
[06]Saṅgahitakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^473-474^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0196^ea^ sampayuttakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā tilamhi telaṃ viya na vedanādayo saññādīsu anupaviṭṭhā, tasmā ‘‘natthi keci dhammā kehici dhammehi sampayuttā, evaṃ sante ^a^V0.0192^ea^ ñāṇasampayuttantiādi niratthakaṃ hotī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ^a^P0.0095^ea^ rājagirikasiddhatthikānaññeva; te sandhāya aññenevatthena sampayuttataṃ dassetuṃ pucchā sakavādissa, attano laddhivasena paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamidhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthameva. Yo panesa paravādinā ‘‘yathā tilamhi tela’’ntiādiko upamāpañho āhaṭo, so yasmā vedanāsaññānaṃ viya tilatelānaṃ lakkhaṇato nānattavavatthānaṃ natthi. Sabbesupi hi tilaaṭṭhitacesu tiloti vohāramattaṃ, teneva tilaṃ nibbattetvā gahite purimasaṇṭhānena tilo nāma na paññāyati, tasmā anāhaṭasadisova hotīti.
[06]Sampayuttakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^475-477^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni cetasikakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā phassikādayo nāma natthi, tasmā ‘‘cetasikenāpi na bhavitabbaṃ, iti natthi cetasiko dhammo’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi rājagirikasiddhatthikānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Sahajāto^eb^ti sampayuttasahajātaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^Phassikā^eb^ti tādisaṃ vohāraṃ apassantassa pucchā paravādissa. Kiṃ vohārena, yathā cittanissitakoti cetasiko, evaṃ sopi phassanissitattā phassikoti vutte doso natthīti paṭiññā sakavādissa. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Cetasikakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^478^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0197^ea^ dānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha dānaṃ nāma tividhaṃ – cāgacetanāpi, viratipi, deyyadhammopi. ‘‘Saddhā hiriyaṃ kusalañca ^a^P0.0096^ea^ dāna’’nti (a. ni. 8.30) āgataṭṭhāne cāgacetanā dānaṃ. ‘‘Abhayaṃ detī’’ti (a. ni. 8.39) āgataṭṭhāne virati. ‘‘Dānaṃ deti annaṃ pāna’’nti āgataṭṭhāne deyyadhammo. Tattha cāgacetanā ‘‘deti vā deyyadhammaṃ, denti ^a^V0.0193^ea^ vā etāya deyyadhamma’’nti dānaṃ. Virati avakhaṇḍanaṭṭhena lavanaṭṭhena vā dānaṃ. Sā hi uppajjamānā bhayabheravādisaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyacetanaṃ dāti khaṇḍeti lunāti vāti dānaṃ. Deyyadhammo diyyatīti dānaṃ. Evametaṃ tividhampi atthato cetasiko ceva dhammo deyyadhammo cāti duvidhaṃ hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘cetasikova dhammo dānaṃ, na deyyadhammo’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi rājagirikasiddhatthikānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^cetasiko^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ deyyadhammavasena codetuṃ ^b^labbhā^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, annādīni viya so na sakkā dātunti paṭikkhepo itarassa. Puna daḷhaṃ katvā puṭṭhe ‘‘abhayaṃ detī’’ti suttavasena paṭiññā tasseva. Phassapañhādīsu pana phassaṃ detītiādivohāraṃ apassanto paṭikkhipateva.

[03]^b^479^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aniṭṭhaphala^eb^ntiādi acetasikassa dhammassa dānabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Na hi acetasiko annādidhammo āyatiṃ vipākaṃ deti, iṭṭhaphalabhāvaniyamanatthaṃ panetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Ayampi hettha adhippāyo – yadi acetasiko annādidhammo dānaṃ bhaveyya, hitacittena aniṭṭhaṃ akantaṃ bhesajjaṃ dentassa nimbabījādīhi viya nimbādayo aniṭṭhameva phalaṃ nibbatteyya. Yasmā panettha hitapharaṇacāgacetanā dānaṃ, tasmā aniṭṭhepi deyyadhamme dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalameva hotīti.

[03]Evaṃ paravādinā cetasikadhammassa dānabhāve patiṭṭhāpite sakavādī itarena pariyāyena deyyadhammassa dānabhāvaṃ sādhetuṃ ^b^dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā^eb^tiādimāha. Paravādī pana cīvarādīnaṃ iṭṭhavipākataṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Suttasādhanaṃ paravādīvādepi yujjati sakavādīvādepi, na pana ekenatthena. Deyyadhammo iṭṭhaphaloti iṭṭhaphalabhāvamattameva paṭikkhittaṃ. Tasmā ^b^tena hi na vattabba^eb^nti iṭṭhaphalabhāveneva na vattabbatā yujjati ^a^M0.0198^ea^. Dātabbaṭṭhena ^a^P0.0097^ea^ pana deyyadhammo dānameva. Dinnañhi dānānaṃ saṅkarabhāvamocanatthameva ayaṃ kathāti.
[06]Dānakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^483^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni paribhogamayapuññakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘tesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 1.47) ca ‘‘yassa bhikkhave, bhikkhu cīvaraṃ paribhuñjamāno’’ti (a. ni. 4.51) ca evamādīni suttāni ayoniso gahetvā yesaṃ paribhogamayaṃ ^a^V0.0194^ea^ nāma puññaṃ atthī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi rājagirikasiddhatthikasammitiyānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^paribhogamaya^eb^nti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘puññaṃ nāma phassādayo kusalā dhammā, na tato paraṃ, tasmā phassādīhi te vaḍḍhitabba’’nti codetuṃ ^b^paribhogamayo phasso^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ itarena tesaṃ avaḍḍhanato paṭikkhittaṃ. ^b^Latāviyā^eb^tiādīni ‘‘kiriyāya vā bhāvanāya vā vināpi yathā latādīni sayameva vaḍḍhanti, kiṃ te evaṃ vaḍḍhantī’’ti codanatthaṃ vuttāni. Tathā panassa avaḍḍhanato ^b^na hevā^eb^ti paṭikkhittaṃ.

[03]^b^484^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na samannāharatī^eb^ti pañhe paṭiggāhakānaṃ paribhogena purimacetanā vaḍḍhati, evaṃ taṃ hoti puññanti laddhivasena paṭijānāti. Tato ^b^anāvaṭṭentassā^eb^tiādīhi puṭṭho dāyakassa cāgacetanaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Tattha ^b^anāvaṭṭentassā^eb^ti dānacetanāya purecārikena āvajjanena bhavaṅgaṃ anāvaṭṭentassa aparivaṭṭentassa. ^b^Anābhogassā^eb^ti nirābhogassa. ^b^Asamannāharantassā^eb^ti na samannāharantassa. Āvajjanañhi bhavaṅgaṃ vicchinditvā attano gatamagge uppajjamānaṃ dānacetanaṃ samannāharati nāma. Evaṃkiccena iminā cittena asamannāharantassa puññaṃ hotīti pucchati. ^b^Amanasikarontassā^eb^ti ^a^P0.0098^ea^ manaṃ akarontassa. Āvajjanena hi tadanantaraṃ uppajjamānaṃ manaṃ karoti nāma. Evaṃ akarontassāti attho. Upayogavacanasmiñhi etaṃ bhummaṃ. ^b^Acetayantassā^eb^ti cetanaṃ anuppādentassa. ^b^Apatthentassā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0199^ea^ patthanāsaṅkhātaṃ kusalacchandaṃ akarontassa. ^b^Appaṇidahantassā^eb^ti dānacetanāvasena cittaṃ aṭṭhapentassāti attho. ^b^Nanu āvaṭṭentassā^eb^ti vāre ^b^ābhogassā^eb^ti ābhogavato. Atha vā ābhogā assa, ābhogassa vā anantaraṃ taṃ puññaṃ hotīti attho.

[03]^b^485^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dvinnaṃ phassāna^eb^ntiādīsupi ekakkhaṇe dāyakassa dvinnaṃ phassādīnaṃ abhāvā paṭikkhipati, dāyakassa ca paribhuñjantassa cāti ubhinnaṃ phassādayo sandhāya paṭijānāti. Apicassa pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti laddhi, tassāpi vasena paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ sakavādī pariyāyassa dvāraṃpidahitvā ujuvipaccanīkavasena codetuṃ ^b^kusalā^eb^dipañhaṃ pucchati. Tatrāpi kusalākusalānaṃ ekassekakkhaṇe sampayogābhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Paribhogamayaṃ pana cittavippayuttaṃ uppajjatīti laddhiyā paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ sakavādī suttena niggaṇhāti.

[03]^b^486^eb^^b^.^eb^ Suttasādhane ārāmaropakādīnaṃ anussaraṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇādivasena antarantarā uppajjamānaṃ ^a^V0.0195^ea^ puññaṃ sandhāya ^b^sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Appamāṇo tassa puññābhisando^eb^ti idaṃ appamāṇavihārino dinnapaccayattā ca ‘‘evarūpo me cīvaraṃ paribhuñjatī’’ti anumodanavasena ca vuttaṃ. Taṃ so ^b^paribhogamaya^eb^nti sallakkheti. Yasmā pana paṭiggāhakena paṭiggahetvā aparibhuttepi deyyadhamme puññaṃ hotiyeva, tasmā sakavādīvādova balavā, tattha paṭiggāhakena paṭiggahiteti attho daṭṭhabbo. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Paribhogamayapuññakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^488-491^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0099^ea^ ito dinnakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘ito dinnena yāpenti, petā kālaṅkatā tahi’’nti (pe. va. 19) vacanaṃ nissāya ‘‘yaṃ ito cīvarādi dinnaṃ teneva yāpentī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi rājagirikasiddhatthikānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^ito dinnenā^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa ^a^M0.0200^ea^. Puna cīvarādivasena anuyutto paṭikkhipati. ^b^Añño aññassa kārako^eb^ti aññassa vipākadāyakānaṃ kammānaṃ añño kārako, na attanāva attano kammaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ puṭṭho pana itaro suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati. ^b^Dānaṃ denta^eb^nti dānaṃ dadamānaṃ disvāti attho. Tattha yasmā attano anumoditattā ca tesaṃ tattha bhogā uppajjanti, tasmāssa iminā kāraṇena laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapentassāpi appatiṭṭhitāva hoti. Na hi te ito dinneneva vatthunā yāpenti. Sesesupi suttasādhanesu eseva nayoti.
[06]Ito dinnakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^492^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni pathavī kammavipākotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā ‘‘atthi issariyasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ, ādhipaccasaṃvattaniyaṃ kamma’’nti ettha issarānaṃ bhāvo issariyaṃ nāma ^a^V0.0196^ea^, adhipatīnañca bhāvo ādhipaccaṃ nāma, pathavissariyaādhipaccasaṃvattanikañca kammaṃ atthīti vuttaṃ. Tasmā yesaṃ ‘‘pathavī kammavipāko’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^pathavī^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Sukhavedanīyā^eb^tiādi kammavipākasabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṃ. ‘‘Phasso hotī’’tiādinā nayena niddiṭṭhesu vipākesu phasso sukhavedanīyādibhedo ^a^P0.0100^ea^ hoti. So ca saññādayo ca sukhavedanādīhi sampayuttā, vedanādayo saññādīhi, sabbepi sārammaṇā, atthi ca nesaṃ purecārikaāvaṭṭanādisaṅkhātaṃ āvajjanaṃ, kammapaccayabhūtā cetanā, yo tattha iṭṭhavipāko, tassa patthanā, paṇidhānavasena pavattā mūlataṇhā, kiṃ te evarūpā pathavīti pucchati. Itaro paṭikkhipati. Paṭilomapucchādīni uttānatthāneva.

[03]^b^493^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kammavipāko paresaṃ sādhāraṇo^eb^ti pañhe phassādayo sandhāya paṭikkhipati, kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpañca pathavīādīnaṃyeva ca sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Asādhāraṇamaññesa^eb^nti suttaṃ parasamayato āharitvā ^a^M0.0201^ea^ dassitaṃ. ^b^Sabbe sattā pathaviṃ paribhuñjantī^eb^ti pañhe pathaviṃ anissite sandhāya paṭikkhipati, nissite sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Pathaviṃ aparibhuñjitvā parinibbāyantī^eb^ti pañhe āruppe parinibbāyantānaṃ vasena paṭijānāti. ^b^Kammavipākaṃ akhepetvā^eb^ti idaṃ parasamayavasena vuttaṃ. Kammavipākañhi khepetvāva parinibbāyantīti tesaṃ laddhi. Sakasamaye pana katokāsassa kammassa uppannaṃ vipākaṃ akhepetvā parinibbānaṃ natthi. Tesañca laddhiyā pathavī sādhāraṇavipākattā uppannavipākoyeva hoti. Taṃ vipākabhāvena ṭhitaṃ akhepetvā parinibbānaṃ na yujjatīti codetuṃ vaṭṭati. Itaro laddhivasena paṭikkhipati. ^b^Cakkavattisattassa kammavipāka^eb^nti pañhe asādhāraṇaṃ phassādiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, sādhāraṇaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Pathavīsamuddasūriyacandimādayo hi sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇakammavipākoti tesaṃ laddhi.

[03]^b^494^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Issariyasaṃvattaniya^eb^nti ettha issariyaṃ nāma bahudhanatā. Ādhipaccaṃ nāma sesajane attano vase vattetvā tehi garukātabbaṭṭhena adhipatibhāvo. Tattha kammaṃ paṭilābhavasena taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ nāma hoti, na janakavasena. Tasmā vipākabhāve asādhakametanti.
[06]Pathavī kammavipākotikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^495^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0101^ea^^a^V0.0197^ea^ jarāmaraṇaṃ vipākotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘atthi dubbaṇṇasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ appāyukasaṃvattaniyaṃ kamma’’nti ettha dubbaṇṇatā nāma jarā. Appāyukatā nāma maraṇaṃ. Taṃsaṃvattaniyañca kammaṃ atthi. Tasmā jarāmaraṇaṃ vipākoti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Paṭilomapañhe ^b^anārammaṇa^eb^nti rūpadhammānaṃ tāva anārammaṇameva, arūpānaṃ pana jarāmaraṇaṃ sampayogalakkhaṇābhāvā anārammaṇameva.

[03]^b^496^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipāko^eb^ti pañhe jarāmaraṇena nāma aniṭṭhavipākena bhavitabbanti laddhiyā paṭijānāti ^a^M0.0202^ea^. Teneva kāraṇena kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ jarāmaraṇassa kusalavipākataṃ paṭikkhipati. Parato cassa akusalavipākataññeva paṭijānāti.

[03]^b^Kusalānañca akusalānañcā^eb^ti pucchāvasena ekato kataṃ, ekakkhaṇe pana taṃ natthi. Abyākatānaṃ avipākānaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ vipākoti vattabbatāya pariyāyo natthi, tasmā abyākatavasena ^b^pucchā na katā^eb^.

[03]^b^497^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dubbaṇṇasaṃvattaniya^eb^nti ettha dubbaṇṇiyaṃ nāma aparisuddhavaṇṇatā. Appāyukatā nāma āyuno ciraṃ pavattituṃ asamatthatā. Tattha akusalakammaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānassa dubbaṇṇarūpassa kammapaccayo hoti, asadisattā panassa taṃvipāko na hoti. Utusamuṭṭhānādino pana taṃpaṭilābhavasena āyuno ca upacchedakavasena paccayo hoti. Evametaṃ pariyāyena taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ nāma hoti, na vipākaphassādīnaṃ viya janakavasena, tasmā vipākabhāve asādhakaṃ. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttasadisamevāti.
[06]Jarāmaraṇaṃ vipākotikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^498^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0102^ea^^a^V0.0198^ea^ ariyadhammavipākakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ kilesappahānamattameva sāmaññaphalaṃ, na cittacetasikā dhammāti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^natthi ariyadhammavipāko^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha ^b^ariyadhammavipāko^eb^ti maggasaṅkhātassa ariyadhammassa vipāko. Kilesakkhayamattaṃ ariyaphalanti laddhiyā paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Sāmañña^eb^nti samaṇabhāvo, maggassetaṃ nāmaṃ. ‘‘Sāmaññañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sāmaññaphalañcā’’ti hi vuttaṃ. Brahmaññepi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Sotāpattiphalaṃ na vipāko^eb^tiādīsu sotāpattimaggādīnaṃ apacayagāmitaṃ sandhāya ariyaphalānaṃ navipākabhāvaṃ paṭijānāti, dānaphalādīnaṃ paṭikkhipati ^a^M0.0203^ea^. So hi ācayagāmittikassa evaṃ atthaṃ dhāreti – vipākasaṅkhātaṃ ācayaṃ gacchanti, taṃ vā ācinantā gacchantīti ācayagāmino, vipākaṃ apacinantā gacchantīti apacayagāminoti. Tasmā evaṃ paṭijānāti ca paṭikkhipati ca.

[03]^b^500^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ savipākaṃ ācayagāmī^eb^tiādikā pucchā paravādissa, paṭiññā ca paṭikkhepo ca sakavādissa.
