[03]^b^771-775^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni rūparāgo rūpadhātupariyāpanno arūparāgo arūpadhātupariyāpannoti kathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā kāmarāgo kāmadhātupariyāpanno, tasmā rūparāgārūparāgehipi rūpadhātuarūpadhātupariyāpannehi bhavitabbanti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Kevalañhi tattha ‘‘rūpadhātuṃ anuseti, arūpadhātuṃ anusetī’’ti padaṃ viseso. Sā ca laddhi andhakānañceva sammitiyānañca. Ayaṃ andhakānaṃyevāti.
[03]Rūparāgo rūpadhātupariyāpanno arūparāgo arūpadhātupariyāpannotikathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Rūpārūpadhātupariyāpannakathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Soḷasamo vaggo.

[03]^b^776-779^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0254^ea^^a^P0.0164^ea^^a^V0.0252^ea^ atthi arahato puññūpacayotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ arahato dānasaṃvibhāgacetiyavandanādīni kammāni disvā atthi arahato puññūpacayoti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘arahā nāma pahīnapuññapāpo, so yadi puññaṃ kareyya, pāpampi kareyyā’’ti codetuṃ ^b^apuññūpacayo^eb^ti āha. Itaro pāṇātipātādikiriyaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. ^b^Puññābhisaṅkhāra^eb^ntiādīsu bhavagāmikammaṃ arahato natthīti paṭikkhipati. ^b^Dānaṃ dadeyyā^eb^tiādīsu kiriyacittena dānādipavattisabbhāvato sakavādī paṭijānāti. Itaro cittaṃ anādiyitvā kiriyāpavattimattadassaneneva laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti. Sā pana ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhāpitā hotīti.
[06]Atthi arahato puññūpacayotikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^780^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni natthi arahato akālamaccūtikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ upacitānaṃ apaṭisaṃveditvā byantībhāvaṃ vadāmī’’ti (a. ni. 10.217) suttassa atthaṃ ayoniso gahetvā ‘‘arahatā nāma ^a^P0.0165^ea^ sabbakammavipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedayitvāva parinibbāyitabbaṃ, tasmā natthi, arahato akālamaccū’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi rājagirikānañceva siddhatthikānañca; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘sace tassa natthi akālamaccu, arahantaghātakena nāma na bhavitabba’’nti ^a^V0.0253^ea^ codetuṃ ^b^natthi arahantaghātako^eb^ti āha. Itaro ānantariyakammassa ceva tādisānañca puggalānaṃ sabbhāvato paṭikkhipati.
[03]^b^781^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Visaṃ na kameyyā^eb^ti pañhe ‘‘yāva pubbe katakammaṃ parikkhayaṃ na gacchati, tāva na kamatī’’ti laddhiyā paṭikkhipati. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti.

[03]^b^782^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nāhaṃ,^eb^^a^M0.0255^ea^^b^bhikkhave^eb^ti suttaṃ idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – sañcetanikānaṃ kammānaṃ katānaṃ vipākaṃ apaṭisaṃveditvā avinditvā ananubhavitvā byantībhāvaṃ tesaṃ kammānaṃ parivaṭumaparicchinnabhāvaṃ na vadāmi, tañca kho diṭṭhadhammavedanīyānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme, na tato paraṃ, upapajjavedanīyānaṃ anantaraṃ upapattiṃ upapajjitvāva na tato paraṃ, aparāpariyavedanīyānaṃ yadā vipākokāsaṃ labhanti, tathārūpe aparāpare vā pariyāye. Evaṃ sabbathāpi saṃsārapavatte sati laddhavipākavāre kamme na vijjateso jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhito mucceyya pāpakammāti. Evaṃ sante yadetaṃ ‘‘aladdhavipākavārampi kammaṃ avassaṃ arahato paṭisaṃveditabba’’nti kappanāvasena ‘‘natthi arahato akālamaccū’’ti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṃ kataṃ, taṃ dukkaṭamevāti.
[06]Natthi arahato akālamaccūtikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^783^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni sabbamidaṃ kammatotikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘kammunā vattati loko’’ti suttaṃ nissāya ‘‘sabbamidaṃ kammakilesavipākavaṭṭaṃ kammatova hotī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi ^a^P0.0166^ea^, seyyathāpi rājagirikānañceva siddhatthikānañca; te sandhāya ^b^sabbamida^eb^nti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘evaṃ sante kammampi kammato āpajjatī’’ti codetuṃ ^b^kammampi kammato^eb^ti āha. Itaro yadi kammampi kammatova nāma taṃ kammaṃ vipākoyeva siyāti paṭikkhipati. ^b^Pubbekatahetū^eb^ti ‘‘yadi sabbamidaṃ kammato, pubbekatahetunā tena bhavitabba’’nti codetuṃ pucchati, itaro pubbekatahetuvādabhayena paṭikkhipati.

[03]^b^784^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kammavipākato^eb^ti ^a^V0.0254^ea^ ‘‘yadi sabbamidaṃ kammato, yaṃ atītabhave pavattassa hetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ, tampi purimatare bhave kammatoti kammavipāko sampajjati, tena te sabbamidaṃ kammavipākato āpajjatī’’ti codetuṃ pucchati. Itaro bījato aṃkurasseva paccuppannapavattassa kammato nibbattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiyaṃ puṭṭho tassāpi kammassa bījassa purimabījato viya ^a^M0.0256^ea^ purimakammato pavattattā paṭijānāti. ^b^Pāṇaṃ haneyyā^eb^tiādi ‘‘yadi sabbaṃ kammavipākato, pāṇātipātādīni kammavipākeneva kareyyā’’ti codetuṃ vuttaṃ. Itaro dussīlyacetanāpi purimakammanibbattā ekena pariyāyena vipākoyevāti laddhiyā paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ ‘‘yadi te pāṇātipāto kammavipākato nibbattati, pāṇātipāto viya vipākopi saphalo āpajjatī’’ti codetuṃ ^b^saphalo^eb^ti āha. Itaro pāṇātipātassa nirayasaṃvattanikādibhāvato saphalataṃ passanto paṭijānāti. Kammavipākassa pana idaṃ nāma phalanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Adinnādānādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro saphalo^eb^ti deyyadhammavasena dānaphalaṃ pucchati. ^b^Kammunā vattatī^eb^ti suttaṃ ‘‘natthi kamma’’nti akammavāditaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ‘‘atthi kamma’’nti kammavāditaṃ kammassakataṃ dīpeti. Na sabbasseva kammato nibbattiṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
[06]Sabbamidaṃ kammatotikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^786-787^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0167^ea^ indriyabaddhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha duvidhaṃ dukkhaṃ – indriyabaddhaṃ, anindriyabaddhañca. Indriyabaddhaṃ dukkhavatthutāya dukkhaṃ, anindriyabaddhaṃ udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena ‘‘yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha’’nti saṅgahitattā dukkhaṃ. Imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā ‘‘yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati, taṃ indriyabaddhameva dukkhaṃ, na itara’’nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṃ, tesaṃ itarassāpi dukkhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^indriyabaddhaññevā^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yasmā bhagavatā ‘yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha’nti vuttaṃ, tasmā indriyabaddheneva tena aniccena bhavitabba’’nti codetuṃ ^b^indriyabaddhaññeva anicca^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Nanu^eb^^a^V0.0255^ea^^b^anindriyabaddhaṃ anicca^eb^nti nanu pathavīpabbatapāsāṇādi anindriyabaddhampi aniccanti attho.

[03]^b^788^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na vattabbaṃ indriyabaddhaññeva dukkha^eb^nti pañhe ^b^āmantā^eb^ti paṭiññā sakavādissa. Anindriyabaddhañhi dukkhadomanassānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Uṇhakālasmiñhi aggi sītakāle ca vāto dukkhassa ārammaṇaṃ, niccampi ^a^M0.0257^ea^ bhogavināsādayo domanassassa. Tasmā vināpi aniccaṭṭhena anindriyabaddhaṃ dukkhanti vattabbaṃ. Kammakilesehi pana anibbattattā dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti na vattabbaṃ, tathā maggena apariññeyyattā. Yasmā pana tiṇakaṭṭhādinirodho vā utubījādinirodho vā dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ nāma na hoti, tasmā indriyabaddhaṃ dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca, itaraṃ pana dukkhamevāti idaṃ nānattaṃ dassetuṃ paṭijānāti. ^b^Yathā indriyabaddhassā^eb^tiādivacanaṃ indriyabaddhassa pariññāya brahmacariyavāsaṃ pariññātassa puna anuppattiṃ dīpeti. Tenevettha sakavādinā paṭikkhepo kato. ‘‘Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkha’’nti vacanena pana saṅgahitassa anindriyabaddhassa dukkhabhāvaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ na sakkāti, tasmā asādhakanti.
[06]Indriyabaddhakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^789-790^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0168^ea^ ṭhapetvā ariyamaggantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yasmā ariyamaggo ‘dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā’ti vutto, tasmā ṭhapetvā ariyamaggaṃ avasesā saṅkhārā dukkhā’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yadi evaṃ samudayassāpi dukkhabhāvo āpajjatī’’ti codetuṃ ^b^dukkhasamudayopī^eb^ti āha. Itaro hetulakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho pavattapariyāpannabhāvaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Tīṇevā^eb^ti pañhesu suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati, laddhivasena paṭijānāti. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Ṭhapetvā ariyamaggantikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^791-792^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0256^ea^ na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggaṇhātītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘paramatthato maggaphalāneva saṅgho, maggaphalehi añño ^a^M0.0258^ea^ saṅgho nāma natthi, maggaphalāni ca na kiñci paṭiggaṇhanti, tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggaṇhātī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi mahāpuññavādīsaṅkhātānaṃ vetullakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^na vattabba^eb^nti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yadi saṅgho na paṭiggaṇheyya, na naṃ satthā āhuneyyātiādīhi thomeyyā’’ti codetuṃ ^b^nanu saṅgho āhuneyyo^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Saṅghassa dānaṃ dentī^eb^ti ‘‘ye te saṅghassa denti, te paṭiggāhakesu asati kassa dadeyyu’’nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Āhutiṃ jātavedo vā^eb^ti suttaṃ parasamayato āgataṃ. Tattha ^b^mahāmegha^eb^nti meghavuṭṭhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Vuṭṭhiñhi medanī paṭiggaṇhāti, na meghameva. Maggo paṭiggaṇhātīti ‘‘maggaphalāni saṅgho’’ti laddhiyā ^a^P0.0169^ea^ vadati, na ca maggaphalāneva saṅgho. Maggaphalapātubhāvaparisuddhe pana khandhe upādāya paññattā aṭṭha puggalā saṅgho, tasmā asādhakametanti.
[06]Na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ paṭiggaṇhātītikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^793-794^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘maggaphalāneva saṅgho nāma, na ca tāni dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetuṃ sakkonti, tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Āhuneyyo^eb^tiādi ‘‘yadi saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya, na naṃ satthā evaṃ thomeyyā’’ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Visodhetī^eb^ti mahapphalaṃ karoti. Saṅghasmiñhi appaṃ dinnaṃ bahu hoti, bahu dinnaṃ bahutaraṃ. ^b^Dakkhiṇeyyā^eb^ti dakkhiṇārahā dakkhiṇāya anucchavikā, dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetuṃ samatthāti attho. ^b^Dakkhiṇaṃ ārādhentī^eb^ti sampādenti, appamattikāyapi dakkhiṇāya mahantaṃ phalaṃ pāpuṇantīti attho. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
[06]Na vattabbaṃ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetītikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^795-796^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0259^ea^^a^V0.0257^ea^ na vattabbaṃ saṅgho bhuñjatītikathā nāma hoti. Tatrāpi ‘‘maggaphalāneva saṅgho nāma, na ca tāni kiñci bhuñjanti, tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅgho bhuñjati, pivati, khādati, sāyatī’’ti ^a^P0.0170^ea^ yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaṃyeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yadi saṅgho na bhuñjeyya, saṅghabhattādikaraṇaṃ niratthakaṃ bhaveyyā’’ti codetuṃ ^b^nanu atthi keci saṅghabhattāni karontī^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Gaṇabhojana^eb^ntiādi ‘‘yadi saṅgho na bhuñjeyya, kassa gaṇabhojanādīni siyu’’nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭha pānānī^eb^ti idampi ‘‘yadi saṅgho na piveyya, kassetāni pānāni satthā anujāneyyā’’ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesamidhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
[06]Na vattabbaṃ saṅgho bhuñjatītikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^797-798^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni na vattabbaṃ saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti. Tatrāpi ‘‘maggaphalāneva saṅgho nāma, na ca sakkā tesaṃ kiñci dātuṃ, na ca tehi paṭiggaṇhituṃ, nāpi tesaṃ dānena koci upakāro ijjhati, tasmā na vattabbaṃ saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphala’’nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaṃyeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Āhuneyyo^eb^tiādi ‘‘yadi saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ na bhaveyya, na naṃ satthā evaṃ thomeyyā’’ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
[06]Na vattabbaṃ saṅghassa dinnaṃ mahapphalantikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^799^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0258^ea^ na vattabbaṃ buddhassa dinnaṃ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘buddho bhagavā na kiñci paribhuñjati, lokānuvattanatthaṃ pana paribhuñjamānaṃ viya ^a^P0.0171^ea^ attānaṃ dasseti, tasmā nirupakārattā na vattabbaṃ tasmiṃ dinnaṃ mahapphala’’nti yesaṃ ^a^M0.0260^ea^ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaṃyeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Dvipadānaṃ aggo^eb^tiādi ‘‘manussadussīlepi dānaṃ sahassaguṇaṃ hoti, kimaṅgaṃ pana evarūpe aggapuggale’’ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
[06]Na vattabbaṃ buddhassa dinnaṃ mahapphalantikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^800-801^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni dakkhiṇāvisuddhikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yadi paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇā visujjheyya, mahapphalā bhaveyya. Dāyakena dānaṃ dinnaṃ, paṭiggāhakena vipāko nibbattitoti añño aññassa kārako bhaveyya, paraṃkataṃ sukhadukkhaṃ āpajjeyya, añño kareyya, añño paṭisaṃvedeyya. Tasmā dāyakatova dānaṃ visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato, dāyakasseva cittavisuddhi vipākadāyikā hotī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Āhuneyyā^eb^tiādi ‘‘yadi paṭiggāhakato dānaṃ na visujjheyya, kimassa āhuneyyādibhāvo kareyyā’’ti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Añño aññassa kārako^eb^ti yadi dāyakassa dānacetanā paṭiggāhakena katā bhaveyya, yuttarūpaṃ siyā. Tassa pana dānacetanā parisuddhā paṭiggāhakasaṅkhātaṃ vatthuṃ paṭicca mahāvipākaṭṭhena visujjhati, tasmā acodanā esā ‘‘paṭiggāhakato dānaṃ visujjhatī’’ti.
[06]Dakkhiṇāvisuddhikathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Sattarasamo vaggo.

[03]^b^802-803^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0172^ea^^a^V0.0259^ea^ manussalokakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘tathāgato loke, jāto loke saṃvaḍḍho, lokaṃ abhibhuyya viharati ^a^M0.0261^ea^ anupalitto lokenā’’ti (saṃ. ni. 3.94) suttaṃ ayoniso gahetvā ‘‘bhagavā tusitabhavane nibbatto tattheva vasati, na manussalokaṃ āgacchati, nimmitarūpamattakaṃ panettha dassetī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi vetullakānaṃyeva, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ puṭṭhokāsena ceva suttasādhanena ca saññāpetuṃ ^b^nanu atthī^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Loke jāto^eb^ti paravādī tusitapuraṃ sandhāya vadati. Satthārā panetaṃ manussalokaññeva sandhāya lokaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Lokaṃ abhibhuyyā^eb^ti paravādī manussalokaṃ abhibhavitvāti diṭṭhiyā vadati, satthā pana ārammaṇalokaṃ abhibhavitvā vihāsi. ^b^Anupalitto lokenā^eb^ti paravādī manussalokena anupalittataṃva sandhāya vadati, satthā pana lokadhammesu kilesehi anupalitto vihāsi. Tasmā asādhakametanti.
[06]Manussalokakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^804-806^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni dhammadesanākathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘tusitapure ṭhito bhagavā dhammadesanatthāya abhinimmitaṃ pesesi, tena ceva tassa ca desanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā āyasmatā ānandena dhammo ^a^P0.0173^ea^ desito, na buddhena bhagavatā’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi vetullakānaññeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yadi tena dhammo desito, sveva satthā bhaveyyā’’ti codetuṃ ^b^abhinimmito jino^eb^tiādimāha. Itaro tathā asampaṭicchanto paṭikkhipati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Dhammadesanākathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^807-808^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0260^ea^ karuṇākathā nāma hoti. Tattha piyāyitānaṃ vatthūnaṃ vipattiyā sarāgānaṃ rāgavasena karuṇāpatirūpikaṃ pavattiṃ disvā ‘‘rāgova ^a^M0.0262^ea^ karuṇā nāma, so ca bhagavato natthi, tasmā natthi buddhassa bhagavato karuṇā’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘karuṇā nāmesā nikkilesatāya ceva sattārammaṇatāya ca cetovimuttitāya ca ekādasānisaṃsatāya ca mettādīhi samānajātikā, tasmā yadi bhagavato karuṇā natthi, mettādayopissa na siyu’’nti codanatthaṃ ^b^natthi buddhassa bhagavato mettā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Ākāruṇiko^eb^ti pañhe tathārūpaṃ vohāraṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Karuṇākathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^809^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni gandhajātakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ buddhe bhagavati ayoniso pemavasena ‘‘bhagavato uccārapassāvo aññe gandhajāte ativiya adhigaṇhāti, natthi tato ca sugandhataraṃ gandhajāta’’nti laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ andhakānañceva ^a^P0.0174^ea^ uttarāpathakānañca; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
[06]Gandhajātakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^810-811^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ekamaggakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ buddhe bhagavati ayoniso pemavaseneva ^a^V0.0261^ea^ ‘‘bhagavā sotāpanno hutvā sakadāgāmī, sakadāgāmī hutvā anāgāmī, anāgāmī hutvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi, ekeneva pana ariyamaggena cattāri phalāni sacchākāsī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ catūhi phalehi saddhiṃ uppannānaṃ catunnaṃ phassādīnaṃ ekato ^a^M0.0263^ea^ samodhānavasena codetuṃ ^b^catunnaṃ phassāna^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Sotāpattimaggenā^eb^tiādi ‘‘kataramaggena sacchikarotī’’ti pucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Arahattamaggenā^eb^ti ca vutte tena sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pahānābhāvavasena codeti. ^b^Bhagavā sotāpanno^eb^ti buddhabhūtassa sotāpannabhāvo natthīti paṭikkhipati. Parato pañhadvayepi eseva nayo. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
[06]Ekamaggakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^813-816^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni jhānasaṅkantikathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ, tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ, catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.923-934) imaṃ paṭipāṭidesanaṃ ^a^P0.0175^ea^ nissāya ‘‘tassa tassa jhānassa upacārappavattiṃ vināva jhānā jhānaṃ saṅkamatī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi mahisāsakānañceva ekaccānañca andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yadi te dutiyajjhānūpacāraṃ appatvā uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamajjhānā dutiyajjhānameva saṅkamati, paṭhamato tatiyaṃ, dutiyato catutthampi saṅkameyyā’’ti codetuṃ ^b^paṭhamā jhānā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Yā paṭhamassā^eb^tiādi ‘‘yadi paṭhamato anantaraṃ dutiyaṃ, dutiyādīhi vā tatiyādīni samāpajjati, ekāvajjanena samāpajjeyyā’’ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Kāme ādīnavato^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ kāme ādīnavato manasi karoto pacchā uppajjati. Jhānakkhaṇe panesa nimittameva manasi karoti. ^b^Taññeva paṭhama^eb^nti ‘‘yadi purimajavanato pacchimajavanaṃ viya anantaraṃ uppajjeyya, ṭhapetvā purimapacchimabhāvaṃ lakkhaṇato taññeva taṃ bhaveyyā’’ti codetuṃ pucchati. Iminā upāyena ^a^V0.0262^ea^ sabbattha attho veditabbo. ^b^Vivicceva kāmehī^eb^tiādīhi paṭipāṭiyā jhānānaṃ desitabhāvaṃ dīpeti, na anantaruppattiṃ, tasmā asādhakanti.
[06]Jhānasaṅkantikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^817-818^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0264^ea^ jhānantarikakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ samaye ‘‘pañcakanaye pañca jhānāni vibhattāni, kevalaṃ tayo samādhī uddiṭṭhā’’ti avitakkavicāramattassa samādhino okāsaṃ ajānantānaṃ ‘‘paṭhamassa ca dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare jhānantarikā nāma esā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi sammitiyānañceva ekaccānañca andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘jhānampi cetasikā dhammā, phassādayopi, tasmā yadi jhānantarikā nāma bhaveyya, phassantarikādīhipi bhavitabba’’nti codanatthaṃ ^b^atthi phassantarikā^eb^tiādimāha ^a^P0.0176^ea^.

[03]^b^Dutiyassa ca jhānassā^eb^ti ‘‘yadi jhānantarikā nāma bhaveyya, dutiyatatiyādīnipi jhānāneva, tesampi antarikāya bhavitabba’’nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. So kevalaṃ laddhiyā abhāvena paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca. ^b^Paṭhamassa cā^eb^ti puṭṭho laddhivasena paṭijānāti.
[03]^b^819^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Savitakko savicāro^eb^tiādi ‘‘tiṇṇampi samādhīnaṃ samādhibhāve samāne avitakko vicāramattova samādhi jhānantariko, na itaroti ko ettha visesahetū’’ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^820-822^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dvinnaṃ jhānānaṃ paṭuppannāna^eb^nti paṭhamadutiyāni sandhāya pucchati. Itaro ‘‘tesaṃ paccuppannānaṃyeva antare avitakko vicāramatto samādhi jhānantariko nāma hotī’’ti laddhiyā paṭijānāti. ^b^Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ niruddha^eb^nti puṭṭho tiṇṇaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavatti na yuttāti paṭijānāti ^a^V0.0263^ea^. ^b^Avitakko vicāramatto samādhi paṭhamaṃ jhāna^eb^nti catukkanayavasena pucchati. Sakavādī tasmiṃ naye tassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati. ^b^Nanu tayo samādhī^eb^ti etthāyamadhippāyo – yathā tesu tīsu samādhīsu dve samādhī jhānāneva, na jhānantarikā, evaṃ itarenapi jhāneneva bhavitabbaṃ, na jhānantarikāyāti.
[06]Jhānantarikakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^823-825^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0265^ea^ samāpanno saddaṃ suṇātītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yasmā paṭhamassa jhānassa saddo kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā, yadi ca samāpanno taṃ na suṇeyya, kathaṃ kaṇḍako siyā. Tasmā samāpanno saddaṃ, suṇātī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatī^eb^tiādi ‘‘samāpannassa tāva pañcadvārappavattaṃ natthi, tasmiṃ asati ^a^P0.0177^ea^ yadi so saddaṃ suṇeyya, rūpampi passeyyā’’ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Saddo kaṇḍako^eb^ti vikkhepakarattā vuttaṃ. Oḷārikena hi saddena sote ghaṭṭite paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tenetaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā asādhakaṃ. ^b^Dutiyassa jhānassā^eb^tiādi ‘‘yathā aññopi kaṇḍako antosamāpattiyaṃ natthi, evaṃ saddassavanampī’’ti bodhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Samāpanno saddaṃ suṇātītikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^826-827^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatītikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā’’ti vacanaṃ nissāya ‘‘pasādacakkhumeva rūpaṃ passatī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānaṃ ^a^V0.0264^ea^, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yadi cakkhunā rūpaṃ passeyya, rūpena rūpaṃ passeyyātī’’ti codetuṃ ^b^rūpena rūpaṃ passatī^eb^ti āha. Itaro rūpāyatanaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā puna puṭṭho cakkhumeva sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Paṭivijānātī^eb^ti ettha ayamadhippāyo – passatīti hi mayaṃ paṭijānanaṃ sandhāya pucchāma, na cakkhūpasaṃhāramattaṃ. Tasmā vadehi tāva ‘‘kiṃ te cakkhumā rūpena rūpaṃ paṭivijānātī’’ti. Itaro purimanayeneva paṭikkhipati ceva paṭijānāti ca. Atha naṃ ‘‘evaṃ sante rūpaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ āpajjati, tañhi paṭivijānāti nāmā’’ti codetuṃ ^b^rūpaṃ manoviññāṇa^eb^nti āha. Itaro lesaṃ alabhanto paṭikkhipateva. ^b^Atthi cakkhussa āvaṭṭanā^eb^tiādi ‘‘yadi cakkhu paṭivijānanaṭṭhena passati, cakkhuviññāṇassa viya tassāpi āvajjanāya ^a^M0.0266^ea^ bhavitabba’’nti codetuṃ pucchati. Itaro yasmā na āvajjanapaṭibaddhaṃ cakkhu, na taṃ āvajjanānantaraṃ uppajjati, tasmā ^b^na heva^eb^nti paṭikkhipati. ^b^Sotena sadda^eb^ntiādīsupi ^a^P0.0178^ea^ eseva nayo. ^b^Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatī^eb^ti sasambhārakathānayena vuttaṃ. Yathā hi usunā vijjhantopi ‘‘dhanunā vijjhatī’’ti vuccati, evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena passantopi ‘‘cakkhunā passatī’’ti vutto, tasmā asādhakametaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayopi.
[06]Cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatītikathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Aṭṭhārasamo vaggo.

[03]^b^828-831^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0179^ea^ kilesapajahanakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yasmā kilesapahānaṃ nāma atthi, pahīnakilesassa ca atītāpi kilesā pahīnāva honti, anāgatāpi, paccuppannāpi, tasmā atītepi kilese pajahati, anāgatepi, paccuppannepī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^atīte^eb^tiādipucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa ^a^V0.0265^ea^. Sesaṃ yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti. ^b^Natthi kilese jahatī^eb^ti imasmiṃ pana paravādissa pañhe yasmā kacavaraṃ pajahantassa kacavare chaḍḍanavāyāmo viya kilese pajahantassa na atītādibhedesu kilesesu vāyāmo atthi, nibbānārammaṇe pana ariyamagge pavattite kilesā anuppannāyeva nuppajjantīti pahīnā nāma honti, tasmā ^b^na heva^eb^nti paṭikkhipati. ^b^Tena hi atīte kilese pajahatī^eb^tiādi pana yasmā ‘‘natthi kilesapajahanā’’ti na vattabbaṃ, tasmā atītādibhede pajahatīti chalena vuttaṃ.
[06]Kilesapajahanakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^832^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0267^ea^ suññatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ^b^suññatā^eb^ti dve suññatā khandhānañca anattalakkhaṇaṃ nibbānañca. Tesu anattalakkhaṇaṃ ^a^P0.0180^ea^ tāva ekaccaṃ ekena pariyāyena siyā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṃ, nibbānaṃ, apariyāpannameva. Imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā ‘‘suññatā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Animitta^eb^nti sabbanimittarahitaṃ nibbānaṃ. ‘‘Appaṇihito’’tipi tasseva nāmaṃ. Kasmā panetaṃ ābhatanti? Avibhajjavādīvāde dosāropanatthaṃ. Yassa hi avibhajitvā ‘‘ekadeseneva suññatā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā’’ti laddhi, tassa nibbānampi saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannanti āpajjati. Imassa dosassāropanatthaṃ ‘‘animittaṃ appaṇihita’’nti ābhataṃ. Itaro tassa pariyāpannabhāvaṃ anicchanto paṭikkhipati. ^b^Saṅkhārakkhandho na anicco^eb^tiādi nibbānasaṅkhātāya suññatāya aniccabhāvāpattidosadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^833^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṅkhārakkhandhassa suññatā^eb^ti ‘‘yadi aññassa khandhassa suññatā aññakkhandhapariyāpannā, saṅkhārakkhandhasuññatāyapi sesakkhandhapariyāpannāya bhavitabba’’nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Saṅkhārakkhandhassa suññatā na vattabbā^eb^tiādi ‘‘yadi saṅkhārakkhandhasuññatā sesakkhandhapariyāpannā ^a^V0.0266^ea^ na hoti, sesakkhandhasuññatāpi saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā na hotī’’ti paṭilomadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^834^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Suññamidaṃ, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā^eb^ti suttaṃ parasamayato ābhataṃ. Tattha ^b^saṅkhārā^eb^ti ‘‘sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā’’ti āgataṭṭhāne viya pañcakkhandhā, te ca attattaniyasuññattā suññatāti sāsanāvacaraṃ hoti, na virujjhati, tasmā anuññātaṃ. Yasmā panetaṃ na suññatāya saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannabhāvaṃ dīpeti, tasmā asādhakanti.
[06]Suññatakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^835-836^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni sāmaññaphalakathā nāma hoti. Tattha maggavīthiyampi phalasamāpattivīthiyampi ariyamaggassa vipākacittaṃ ^a^P0.0181^ea^ sāmaññaphalaṃ nāmāti ^a^M0.0268^ea^ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Yesaṃ pana tathā aggahetvā ‘‘kilesapahānañceva phaluppatti ca sāmaññaphalaṃ, tasmā asaṅkhata’’nti laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā yathā pāḷimeva niyyātīti.
[06]Sāmaññaphalakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^837-840^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni pattikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yaṃ yaṃ paṭilabbhati, tassa tassa paṭilābho patti nāma. Sā ca asaṅkhatā’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaññeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamidhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti ^a^V0.0267^ea^. ^b^Na vattabba^eb^ntiādi yāya laddhiyā patti asaṅkhatāti maññati, taṃ pakāsetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha sakavādī ‘‘na hevaṃ vattabbe’’ti paṭikkhipanto kevalaṃ pattiyā rūpādibhāvaṃ na sampaṭicchati. Na hi patti nāma koci dhammo atthi, na pana asaṅkhatabhāvaṃ anujānāti. Itaro pana paṭikkhepamatteneva asaṅkhatāti laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti, sā ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhitāyevāti.
[06]Pattikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^841-843^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni tathatākathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘rūpādīnaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ rūpādisabhāvatāsaṅkhātā tathatā nāma atthi, sā ca saṅkhatesu rūpādīsu apariyāpannattā asaṅkhatā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa ^a^P0.0182^ea^, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamidhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā pākaṭamevāti.
[06]Tathatākathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^844-846^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0269^ea^ kusalakathā nāma hoti. Tattha anavajjampi kusalaṃ iṭṭhapākampi. Anavajjaṃ nāma kilesavippayuttaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo ṭhapetvā akusalaṃ sabbadhamme bhajati. Iṭṭhavipākaṃ nāma āyatiṃ upapattipavattesu iṭṭhaphalanipphādakaṃ puññaṃ. Ayaṃ nayo kusalattike ādipadameva bhajati. Yesaṃ pana imaṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā anavajjabhāvamatteneva nibbānaṃ kusalanti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ, tesaṃ iṭṭhavipākaṭṭhena nibbānassa kusalatābhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ ^a^V0.0268^ea^ pucchā sakavādissa, attano laddhivasena paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamidhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Kusalakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^847^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni accantaniyāmakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggova hotī’’ti (a. ni. 7.15) suttaṃ nissāya ‘‘atthi puthujjanassa accantaniyāmatā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Mātughātako^eb^tiādi ‘‘niyatamicchādiṭṭhikassa ca mātughātakādīnañca samāne micchattaniyāme mātughātakādīhipi te accantaniyatehi bhavitabba’’nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Itaro ‘‘niyatamicchādiṭṭhiko saṃsārakhāṇuko bhavantarepi niyatova ime pana ekasmiññeva attabhāve’’ti laddhiyā ^b^na heva^eb^nti paṭikkhipati ^a^P0.0183^ea^.

[03]^b^848^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vicikicchā uppajjeyyā^eb^ti ‘‘ayaṃ niyato vā no vā’’ti evaṃ uppajjeyyāti pucchati. Itaro anuppattikāraṇaṃ apassanto paṭijānāti. ^b^Nuppajjeyyā^eb^ti puṭṭho pana yaṃ diṭṭhiṃ āsevanto niyāmaṃ okkanto, tattha anuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Tato ^b^pahīnā^eb^ti puṭṭho maggena appahīnattā paṭikkhipati, taṃ diṭṭhiṃ ārabbha asamudācārato paṭijānāti. Atha naṃ yasmā pahānaṃ nāma vinā ariyamaggena natthi, tasmā tassa vasena codetuṃ ^b^sotāpattimaggenā^eb^tiādimāha. So ekamaggenāpi appahīnattā ^a^M0.0270^ea^ paṭikkhipati. Puna ^b^katamenā^eb^ti puṭṭho micchāmaggaṃ sandhāya ^b^akusalenā^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^849^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ucchedadiṭṭhi uppajjeyyā^eb^ti dutiyaniyāmuppattiṃ pucchati. Itaro yasmā ‘‘yepi te okkalā vayabhiññā natthikavādā akiriyavādā ahetukavādā’’ti (ma. ni. 3.143) vacanato tissopi niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyo ekassa uppajjanti, tasmā paṭijānāti.

[03]^b^850^eb^^b^.^eb^ Atha ^a^V0.0269^ea^ naṃ ‘‘na ca nāma so accantaniyāmo’’ti codetuṃ ^b^hañcī^eb^tiādimāha. Accantaniyatassa hi dutiyaniyāmo niratthako. ^b^Nuppajjeyyā^eb^ti pañhe yaṃ sassatadiṭṭhiyā sassatanti gahitaṃ, tadeva ucchijjissatīti gahetvā anuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Pahīnā^eb^ti puṭṭho maggena appahīnattā paṭikkhipati, vuttanayena anuppajjanato paṭijānāti. ^b^Sassatadiṭṭhi uppajjeyyā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Sesaṃ vicikicchāvāre vuttanayameva.

[03]^b^851-852^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na vattabba^eb^nti pucchā paravādissa, suttassa atthitāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. Na pana so bhavantarepi nimuggova. Imasmiññeva hi bhave abhabbo so taṃ diṭṭhiṃ pajahitunti ayamettha adhippāyo, tasmā asādhakametanti. ^b^Sabbakālaṃ ummujjitvā nimujjatī^eb^tiādi vacanamatte abhinivesaṃ akatvā attho pariyesitabboti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti.
[06]Accantaniyāmakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^853-856^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni indriyakathā nāma hoti. Tattha lokiyā saddhā saddhā ^a^P0.0184^ea^ eva nāma, na saddhindriyaṃ. Tathā lokiyaṃ vīriyaṃ…pe… sati… samādhi… paññā paññāyeva nāma, na paññindriyanti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānañceva mahisāsakānañca; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa ^a^M0.0271^ea^. ^b^Natthi lokiyā saddhā^eb^tiādi yasmā lokiyāpi saddhādayova dhammā adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyaṃ, na saddhādīhi aññaṃ saddhindriyādi nāma atthi, tasmā lokiyānampi saddhādīnaññeva saddhindriyādibhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Atthi lokiyo mano^eb^tiādi yathā te lokiyāpi manādayo dhammā manindriyādīni, evaṃ lokiyā saddhādayopi saddhindriyānīti upamāya tassatthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
[06]Indriyakathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Ekūnavīsatimo vaggo.

[03]^b^857-862^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0185^ea^^a^V0.0270^ea^ asañciccakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘ānantariyavatthūni nāma garūni bhāriyāni, tasmā asañciccāpi tesu vatthūsu vikopitesu ānantariko hotī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^asañciccā^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, laddhivasena paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yasmā ānantariyakammaṃ nāma kammapathappattaṃ. Yadi ca asañcicca kammapathabhedo siyā, avasesā pāṇātipātādayopi asañcicca bhaveyyu’’nti codanatthaṃ ^b^asañciccapāṇaṃ hantvā^eb^tiādimāha. Itaro tathārūpāya laddhiyā abhāvena paṭikkhipati. Sesaṃ yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti. ^b^Na vattabbaṃ mātughātako^eb^ti pucchā paravādissa, rogapaṭikārādikāle asañcicca ghātaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. ^b^Nanu mātā jīvitā voropitā^eb^ti pañhepi asañcicca voropitaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādisseva. Evaṃ adhippāyaṃ pana aggahetvā hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṃ itarassa. Taṃ ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhitameva. Pitughātakādīsupi eseva nayo. Saṅghabhedake pana dhammasaññiṃ sandhāya ^b^saṅghabhedo ānantariko^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, ‘‘saṅghaṃ samaggaṃ bhetvāna, kappaṃ ^a^M0.0272^ea^ nirayamhi paccatī’’ti vacanaṃ ayoniso gahetvā paṭiññā paravādissa. Puna ^b^sabbe^eb^ti puṭṭho sakapakkhe dhammasaññiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, parapakkhe dhammasaññiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Dhammasaññī^eb^ti ^a^P0.0186^ea^ pañhadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā^eb^ti suttaṃ ekanteneva dhammavādissa ānantarikabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Āpāyiko nerayiko^eb^ti gāthāyapi adhammavādīyeva adhippeto. Itaro pana adhippāyaṃ aggahetvā laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti. Sā ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhitāyevāti.
[06]Asañciccakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^863-865^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0271^ea^ ñāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha duvidhaṃ ñāṇaṃ – lokiyañca lokuttarañca. Lokiyaṃ samāpattiñāṇampi hoti dānādivasena pavattaṃ kammassakatañāṇampi; lokuttaraṃ saccaparicchedakaṃ maggañāṇampi phalañāṇampi. Imaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ akatvā ‘‘saccaparicchedakameva ñāṇaṃ na itaraṃ, tasmā natthi puthujjanassa ñāṇa’’nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Paññā^eb^tiādi ñāṇavevacanadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenetaṃ dīpeti – yadi tassa ñāṇaṃ natthi, paññādayopi natthi. Atha paññādayo atthi, ñāṇampi atthi. Kasmā? Paññādīnaṃ ñāṇato anaññattāti. ^b^Paṭhamaṃ jhāna^eb^ntiādi samāpattiñāṇassa dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Dānaṃ dadeyyā^eb^tiādi kammassakatañāṇassa. ^b^Dukkhaṃ parijānātī^eb^ti lokuttaramaggañāṇameva dīpeti, na ca lokuttarameva ñāṇanti.
[06]Ñāṇakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^866^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0187^ea^ nirayapālakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘niraye nerayikakammāneva nirayapālarūpavasena vadhenti, natthi nirayapālā nāma sattā’’ti ^a^M0.0273^ea^ yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yadi tattha nirayapālā na siyuṃ, kammakāraṇāpi na bhaveyyuṃ. Kāraṇikesu hi sati kāraṇā’’ti codetuṃ ^b^natthi nirayesū^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^867-868^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Atthi manussesū^eb^ti paccakkhena ñāpanatthaṃ. Yathā hi manussesu sati kāraṇikesu kāraṇā, evaṃ tatthāpīti ayamettha adhippāyo. ^b^Atthi nirayesū^eb^ti pucchā paravādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Na vessabhū nopi ca pettirājā^eb^ti paravādinā sakasamayato suttaṃ ābhataṃ. Taṃ pana sāsanāvacarikanti sakavādinā anuññātaṃ. Tattha ^b^vessabhū^eb^ti eko devo. ^b^Pettirājā^eb^ti pettivisaye petamahiddhiko. ^b^Somā^eb^dayo pākaṭā eva. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – attano kammehi ito paṇunnaṃ ^a^V0.0272^ea^ paralokaṃ pattaṃ purisaṃ na ete vessabhūādayo hananti. Yehi pana so kammehi tattha paṇunno, tāni sakāni kammāniyeva naṃ tattha hanantīti kammassakataṃ dīpeti, na nirayapālānaṃ abhāvaṃ. Sakavādinā pana ^b^tamenaṃ, bhikkhave^eb^ti ābhatāni suttapadāni nītatthānevāti.
[06]Nirayapālakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^869-871^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni tiracchānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha devesu erāvaṇādayo devaputtā hatthivaṇṇaṃ assavaṇṇaṃ vikubbanti, natthi tattha tiracchānagatā. Yesaṃ pana tiracchānavaṇṇino devaputte disvā ‘‘atthi devesu tiracchānagatā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ ^a^P0.0188^ea^; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yadi devayoniyaṃ tiracchānagatā siyuṃ, tiracchānayoniyampi devā siyu’’nti codetuṃ ^b^atthi tiracchānagatesū^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Kīṭā^eb^tiādi yesaṃ so abhāvaṃ icchati, te dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Erāvaṇo^eb^ti pañhe tassa atthitāya paṭiññā sakavādissa ^a^M0.0274^ea^, na tiracchānagatassa. ^b^Hatthibandhā^eb^tiādi ‘‘yadi tattha hatthiādayo siyuṃ, hatthibandhādayopi siyu’’nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^yāvasikā^eb^ti yavassa dāyakā. ^b^Kāraṇikā^eb^ti hatthācariyādayo, yehi te nānāvidhaṃ kāraṇaṃ kareyyuṃ. ^b^Bhattakārakā^eb^ti hatthiādīnaṃ bhattarandhakā. ^b^Na heva^eb^nti tathā anicchanto paṭikkhipatīti.
[06]Tiracchānakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^872-875^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni maggakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yesaṃ ‘‘pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī’’ti (a. ni. 3.431) idañceva suttaṃ sammāvācākammantājīvānañca ^a^V0.0273^ea^ cittavippayuttataṃ nissāya ‘‘nippariyāyena pañcaṅgikova maggo’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi mahisāsakānaṃ, te sandhāya ^b^pañcaṅgiko^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Sammāvācā maggaṅgaṃ, sā ca na maggoti^eb^ādi parasamayavasena vuttaṃ. Parasamayasmiñhi sammāvācādayo maggaṅganti āgatā. Rūpattā pana maggo na hotīti vaṇṇitā. ^b^Sammādiṭṭhi maggaṅga^eb^ntiādi maggaṅgassa amaggatā nāma natthīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Pubbeva kho panassā^eb^ti sutte parisuddhasīlassa maggabhāvanā nāma hoti, na itarassāti āgamaniyapaṭipadāya visuddhibhāvadassanatthaṃ ‘‘kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī’’ti vuttaṃ, na imehi vinā pañcaṅgikabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Tenevāha ^a^P0.0189^ea^ ‘‘evamassāyaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatī’’ti. Sakavādinā ābhatasuttaṃ nītatthamevāti.
[06]Maggakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^876-877^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ñāṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha dhammacakkappavattane dvādasākārañāṇaṃ sandhāya ‘‘dvādasavatthukaṃ ñāṇaṃ lokuttara’’nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ^a^M0.0275^ea^ pubbaseliyānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘sace taṃ dvādasavatthukaṃ, dvādasahi maggañāṇehi bhavitabba’’nti codetuṃ ^b^dvādasā^eb^tiādimāha. Itaro maggassa ekattaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, ekekasmiṃ sacce saccañāṇakiccañāṇakatañāṇānaṃ vasena ñāṇanānattaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Dvādasa sotāpattimaggā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā^eb^ti suttaṃ saddhiṃ pubbabhāgaparabhāgehi ñāṇanānattaṃ dīpeti, na ariyamaggassa dvādasa ñāṇataṃ. Tasmā asādhakanti.
[06]Ñāṇakathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Vīsatimo vaggo.
[06]Catutthapaṇṇāsako samatto.

[03]^b^878^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0190^ea^^a^V0.0274^ea^ sāsanakathā nāma hoti. Tattha tisso saṅgītiyo sandhāya ‘‘sāsanaṃ navaṃ kata’’nti ca ‘‘atthi koci tathāgatassa sāsanaṃ navaṃ karotī’’ti ca ‘‘labbhā tathāgatassa sāsanaṃ navaṃ kātu’’nti ca yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya tīsupi kathāsu pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Satipaṭṭhānā^eb^tiādi sāsanaṃ nāma satipaṭṭhānādayo ceva ariyadhammā, kusalādīnañca desanā. Tattha yesaṃ bhagavatā desitā satipaṭṭhānādayo, ṭhapetvā te aññesaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ karaṇena akusalādīnaṃ vā kusalādibhāvakaraṇena sāsanaṃ navaṃkataṃ nāma bhaveyya, kiṃ taṃ evaṃ kataṃ kenaci, atthi vā koci evaṃ karoti, labbhā vā evaṃ kātunti tīsupi pucchāsu codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
[06]Sāsanakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^879-880^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0276^ea^ avivittakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yassa puggalassa yo dhammo paccuppanno, so tena avivitto nāmāti idaṃ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Yasmā pana puthujjanena tedhātukā dhammā apariññātā, tasmā so ekakkhaṇeyeva sabbehipi tedhātukehi dhammehi avivittoti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva, te ^a^P0.0191^ea^ sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Phassehī^eb^tiādi sabbesaṃ phassādīnaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavattidosadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Avivittakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^881-882^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0275^ea^ saññojanakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā arahā sabbaṃ buddhavisayaṃ na jānāti, tasmā tassa tattha avijjāvicikicchāhi appahīnāhi bhavitabbanti saññāya ‘‘atthi kiñci saññojanaṃ appahāya arahattappattī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Atthi kiñci sakkāyadiṭṭhī^eb^tiādi arahato sabbasaṃyojanappahānadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbaṃ buddhavisaya^eb^nti pañhadvaye arahato sabbaññutaññāṇābhāvena paṭisedho kato, na avijjāvicikicchānaṃ appahānena. Itaro pana tesaṃ appahīnataṃ sandhāya ^b^tena hī^eb^ti laddhiṃ patiṭṭhapeti. Sā ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
[06]Saññojanakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^883-884^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni iddhikathā nāma hoti. Tattha iddhi nāmesā katthaci ijjhati, katthaci na ijjhati, aniccādīnaṃ niccādikaraṇe ekanteneva na ijjhati. Sabhāgasantatiṃ pana parivattetvā visabhāgasantatikaraṇe vā sabhāgasantativaseneva ^a^M0.0277^ea^ ciratarappavattane vā yesaṃ atthāya kariyati, tesaṃ puññādīni kāraṇāni nissāya katthaci ijjhati, bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya pānīyassa sappikhīrādikaraṇe viya mahādhātunidhāne dīpādīnaṃ cirasantānappavattane viya cāti idaṃ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Yaṃ ^a^P0.0192^ea^ pana āyasmā pilindavaccho rañño pāsādaṃ suvaṇṇantveva adhimucci, taṃ nissāya yesaṃ ‘‘atthi adhippāyaiddhī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^atthi adhippāyaiddhī^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa. Tattha ^b^adhippāyaiddhī^eb^ti adhippāyaiddhi, yathādhippāyaṃ ijjhanaiddhīti attho. ^b^Āmantā^eb^ti laddhimatte ṭhatvā paṭiññā paravādissa. Atha naṃ aniccādīnaṃ niccāditāya anuyuñjituṃ ^b^niccapaṇṇā rukkhā hontū^eb^tiādimāha. Sesamettha uttānatthameva. Laddhipatiṭṭhāpane ^b^suvaṇṇo ca panāsī^eb^ti rañño puññūpanissayena āsi, na kevalaṃ therassa adhippāyeneva. Tasmā asādhakametanti.
[06]Iddhikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^885^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0276^ea^ buddhakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ṭhapetvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle sarīravemattataṃ āyuvemattataṃ pabhāvemattatañca sesehi buddhadhammehi buddhānaṃ buddhehi hīnātirekatā nāma natthi. Yesaṃ pana aviseseneva atthīti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^atthi buddhāna^eb^nti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ buddhadhammehi anuyuñjituṃ ^b^satipaṭṭhānato^eb^tiādimāha. Itaro tesaṃ vasena hīnātirekataṃ apassanto paṭikkhipatiyevāti.
[06]Buddhakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^886^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni sabbadisākathā nāma hoti. Tattha catūsu disāsu heṭṭhā ^a^P0.0193^ea^ uparīti samantato lokadhātusannivāsaṃ, sabbalokadhātūsu ca ^a^M0.0278^ea^ buddhā atthīti attano vikappasippaṃ uppādetvā ‘‘sabbadisāsu buddhā tiṭṭhantī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Puratthimāyā^eb^ti puṭṭho sakyamuniṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho laddhivasena aññalokadhātuyaṃ ṭhitaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. ^b^Kinnāmo so bhagavā^eb^tiādi ‘‘sace tvaṃ jānāsi, nāmādivasena naṃ kathehī’’ti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabboti.
[06]Sabbadisākathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^887-888^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni dhammakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā rūpādayo rūpādisabhāvena niyatā ^a^V0.0277^ea^ na taṃ sabhāvaṃ vijahanti, tasmā sabbadhammā niyatāti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānañceva ekaccānañca uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^sabbe dhammā^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘sace te niyatā, micchattaniyatā vā siyuṃ sammattaniyatā vā, ito añño niyāmo nāma natthī’’ti codetuṃ ^b^micchattaniyatā^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha paṭikkhepo ca paṭiññā ca paravādissa. ^b^Rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhenā^eb^tiādi yenatthena niyatāti vadati, tassa vasena codetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – rūpañhi rūpaṭṭhena niyatanti rūpaṃ rūpameva, na vedanādisabhāvanti adhippāyena vattabbaṃ, ito aññathā na vattabbaṃ. Kasmā? Rūpaṭṭhato aññassa rūpassa abhāvā. Rūpasabhāvo hi rūpaṭṭho, rūpasabhāvo ca rūpameva, na rūpato añño. Vedanādīhi panassa nānattapaññāpanatthaṃ esa vohāro hotīti. Tasmā ‘‘rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyata’’nti vadantena rūpaṃ niyatanti vuttaṃ hoti. Niyatañca nāma micchattaniyataṃ ^a^P0.0194^ea^ vā siyā sammattaniyataṃ vā, ito añño niyāmo nāma natthīti. Atha kasmā paṭijānātīti? Atthantaravasena. ^b^Rūpaṃ rūpaṭṭhena niyata^eb^nti ettha hi rūpaṃ rūpameva, na vedanādisabhāvanti ayamattho. Tasmā paṭijānāti. Ito aññathā panassa niyatattaṃ natthīti puna teneva nayena codetuṃ ^b^micchattaniyata^eb^ntiādimāha ^a^M0.0279^ea^. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthameva. ^b^Tena hi rūpa^eb^nti laddhipi ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
[06]Dhammakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^889-891^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni kammakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yasmā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādīni diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṭṭhādīhi niyatāni, tasmā sabbe kammā niyatā’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṭṭhena niyata^eb^nti ettha diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṭṭhameva. Sace diṭṭheva dhamme vipākaṃ dātuṃ sakkoti deti, no ce ahosikammaṃ nāma hotīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa. Micchattasammattaniyāmavasena panetaṃ aniyatamevāti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
[06]Kammakathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Ekavīsatimo vaggo.

[03]^b^892^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0195^ea^^a^V0.0278^ea^ parinibbānakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘yasmā arahā sabbaññuvisaye appahīnasaṃyojanova parinibbāyati, tasmā atthi kiñci saṃyojanaṃ appahāya parinibbāna’’nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
[06]Parinibbānakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^894-895^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0280^ea^ kusalacittakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā arahā sativepullappatto parinibbāyantopi sato sampajānova parinibbāti, tasmā kusalacitto parinibbāyatīti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ yasmā kusalacitto nāma puññābhisaṅkhārābhisaṅkharaṇādivasena hoti, tasmā tenatthena codetuṃ ^b^arahā puññābhisaṅkhāra^eb^ntiādimāha. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyāti. ^b^Sato sampajāno^eb^ti idaṃ javanakkhaṇe kiriyasatisampajaññānaṃ vasena asammohamaraṇadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, na kusalacittadīpanatthaṃ. Tasmā asādhakanti.
[06]Kusalacittakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^896^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0196^ea^^a^V0.0279^ea^ āneñjakathā nāma hoti. Tattha bhagavā catutthajjhāne ṭhito parinibbāyīti sallakkhetvā ‘‘arahā āneñje ṭhito parinibbāyatī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Pakaticitte^eb^ti bhavaṅgacitte. Sabbe hi saññino sattā bhavaṅgacitte ṭhatvā bhavaṅgapariyosānena cuticittena kālaṃ karonti. Iti naṃ iminā atthena codetuṃ evamāha. Tattha kiñcāpi catuvokārabhave arahato pakaticittampi āneñjaṃ hoti, ayaṃ pana pañho pañcavokārabhavavasena uddhaṭo. Tasmā ^b^no ca vata re vattabbe^eb^ti āha. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Āneñjakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^897^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni dhammābhisamayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha atītabhave sotāpannaṃ mātukucchiyaṃ vasitvā nikkhantaṃ disvā ‘‘atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammābhisamayo’’ti ^a^M0.0281^ea^ yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘yadi tattha dhammābhisamayo atthi, dhammābhisamayassa kāraṇehi dhammadesanādīhi bhavitabba’’nti codetuṃ ^b^atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Suttassā^eb^tiādi bhavaṅgavāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Gabbhaseyyāya hi yebhuyyena bhavaṅgameva pavattati. Teneva satto kiriyamayappavattābhāvā sutto, bhāvanānuyogassa abhāvā pamatto, kammaṭṭhānapariggāhakānaṃ satisampajaññānaṃ abhāvā muṭṭhassati asampajāno nāma hoti, tathārūpassa kuto dhammābhisamayoti?
[06]Dhammābhisamayakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^898-900^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0197^ea^^a^V0.0280^ea^ tissopikathā nāma honti. Tattha acirajātānaṃ pana sotāpannānaṃ arahattappattiṃ suppavāsāya ca upāsikāya sattavassikaṃ gabbhaṃ disvā ‘‘atthi gabbhaseyyāya arahattappattī’’ti ca supine ākāsagamanādīni disvā ‘‘atthi dhammābhisamayo’’ti ca ‘‘atthi tattha arahattappattī’’ti ca idhāpi yesaṃ laddhiyo, seyyathāpi tesaññeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha purimakathā sadisamevāti.
[06]Tissopikathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^901-902^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni abyākatakathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘atthesā, bhikkhave, cetanā, sā ca kho abbohārikā’’ti (pārā. 235) vacanato ‘‘sabbaṃ supinagatassa cittaṃ abyākata’’nti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaññeva, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha yathā pāḷimeva niyyāti. ^b^Supinagatassa cittaṃ abbohārika^eb^nti idaṃ ^a^M0.0282^ea^ āpattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Supinagatassa hi pāṇātipātādivasena kiñcāpi akusalacittaṃ pavattati, vatthuvikopanaṃ pana natthīti na sakkā tattha āpattiṃ paññapetuṃ. Iminā kāraṇena taṃ abbohārikaṃ, na abyākatattāti.
[06]Abyākatakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^903-905^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni āsevanapaccayakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā sabbe ^a^P0.0198^ea^ dhammā khaṇikā ^a^V0.0281^ea^, na koci muhuttampi ṭhatvā āsevanapaccayaṃ āsevati nāma. Tasmā natthi kiñci āsevanapaccayatā. Āsevanapaccayatāya uppannaṃ pana na kiñci atthīti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ suttavaseneva paññāpetuṃ ^b^nanu vuttaṃ bhagavatā pāṇātipāto^eb^tiādi ābhataṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Āsevanapaccayakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^906-907^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni khaṇikakathā nāma hoti. Tattha yasmā sabbasaṅkhatadhammā aniccā, tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikāyeva. Samānāya hi aniccatāya eko lahuṃ bhijjati, eko cirenāti ko ettha niyāmoti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyāparaseliyānaṃ; te sandhāya ^b^ekacittakkhaṇikā^eb^ti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. ^b^Citte mahāpathavī^eb^tiādīsu tesaṃ tathā saṇṭhānaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. ^b^Cakkhāyatana^eb^ntiādi ‘‘yadi sabbe ekacittakkhaṇikā bhaveyyuṃ, cakkhāyatanādīni cakkhuviññāṇādīhi saddhiṃyeva uppajjitvā nirujjheyyu’’nti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Itaro pana antomātukucchigatassa viññāṇuppattiṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati ^a^M0.0283^ea^, pavattaṃ sandhāya laddhivasena paṭijānāti. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti. ^b^Tena hi ekacittakkhaṇikā^eb^ti yasmā niccā na honti, tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikāti attano ruciyā kāraṇaṃ vadati. Taṃ avuttasadisamevāti.
[06]Khaṇikakathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Bāvīsatimo vaggo.

[03]^b^908^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^P0.0199^ea^^a^V0.0282^ea^ ekādhippāyakathā nāma hoti. Tattha kāruññena vā ekena adhippāyena ekādhippāyo, saṃsāre vā ekato bhavissāmāti itthiyā saddhiṃ buddhapūjādīni katvā paṇidhivasena eko adhippāyo assāti ekādhippāyo. Evarūpo dvinnampi janānaṃ ekādhippāyo methuno dhammo paṭisevitabboti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānañceva vetullakānañca; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha yathāpāḷimeva niyyātīti.
[06]Ekādhippāyakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^909^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni arahantavaṇṇakathā nāma hoti. Tattha iriyāpathasampanne ākappasampanne pāpabhikkhū disvā ‘‘arahantānaṃ vaṇṇena amanussā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ uttarāpathakānaṃ; te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Arahantavaṇṇakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^910-914^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^M0.0284^ea^ issariyakāmakārikākathā nāma hoti. Chaddantajātakādīni sandhāya ^a^V0.0283^ea^ ‘‘bodhisatto issariyakāmakārikāhetu vinipātaṃ ^a^P0.0200^ea^ gacchati, gabbhaseyyaṃ okkamati, dukkarakārikaṃ akāsi, aparantapaṃ akāsi, aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddisī’’ti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesaṃ paṭhamakathāyaṃ uttānatthameva. Dutiyakathāyaṃ ^b^iddhimā^eb^ti yadi issariyakāmakārikāhetu gaccheyya, iddhiyā gaccheyya, na kammavasenāti codanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Itaro pana paṭhamapañhe bhāvanāmayaṃ sandhāya paṭikkhipati. Dutiyapañhe puññiddhiṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti. Tatiyakathāyaṃ issariyakāmakārikāhetu nāma dukkarakārikā micchādiṭṭhiyā kariyati. Yadi ca so taṃ kareyya, sassatādīnipi gaṇheyyāti codanatthaṃ ^b^sassato loko^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Catutthakathāyampi eseva nayoti.
[06]Issariyakāmakārikākathāvaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^915-916^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni rāgapatirūpakathā nāma hoti. Tattha mettākaruṇāmuditāyo sandhāya ‘‘na rāgo rāgapatirūpako’’ti ca issāmacchariyakukkuccāni sandhāya ‘‘na doso dosapatirūpako’’ti ca hasituppādaṃ sandhāya ‘‘na moho mohapatirūpako’’ti ca dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anuggahaṃ pāpagarahitaṃ kalyāṇapasaṃsaṃ āyasmato pilindavacchassa vasalavādaṃ bhagavato kheḷāsakavādaṃ moghapurisavādañca sandhāya ‘‘na kileso kilesapatirūpako’’ti ca yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṃ; te sandhāya sabbakathāsu pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ yasmā phassādipatirūpakā naphassādayo nāma natthi, tasmā rāgādipatirūpakā narāgādayopi natthīti ^a^M0.0285^ea^ codetuṃ ^b^atthi na phasso^eb^tiādimāha ^a^P0.0201^ea^. Itaro tesaṃ abhāvā paṭikkhipati. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06]Patirūpakathāvaṇṇanā.
[03]^b^917-918^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idāni ^a^V0.0284^ea^ aparinipphannakathā nāma hoti. Tattha –
[21]‘‘Dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti ca;
[22]Nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṃ dukkhā nirujjhatī’’ti. (saṃ. ni. 1.171) –

[03]Vacanaṃ nissāya dukkhaññeva parinipphannaṃ, sesā khandhāyatanadhātuindriyadhammā aparinipphannāti yesaṃ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṃ uttarapathakānañceva hetuvādānañca; te sandhāya ^b^rūpaṃ aparinipphanna^eb^nti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Atha naṃ ‘‘sace rūpaṃ aparinipphannaṃ, na aniccādisabhāvaṃ siyā’’ti codetuṃ ^b^rūpaṃ na anicca^eb^ntiādimāha. Itaro tathārūpaṃ rūpaṃ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Sakavādī ^b^nanu rūpaṃ anicca^eb^ntiādi vacanena tassa ekaṃ laddhiṃ paṭisedhetvā dutiyaṃ pucchanto ^b^dukkhaññeva parinipphanna^eb^ntiādimāha. Athassa tampi laddhiṃ paṭisedhetuṃ ^b^na yadanicca^eb^ntiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – na kevalañhi paṭhamasaccameva dukkhaṃ. Yaṃ pana kiñci aniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhameva. Rūpañca aniccaṃ, tasmā tampi parinipphannaṃ. Iti yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi ‘‘rūpaṃ aparinipphannaṃ, dukkhaññeva parinipphanna’’nti, taṃ no vata re vattabbe ‘‘dukkhaññeva parinipphanna’’nti. Vedanādimūlikādīsupi yojanāsu eseva nayo. Dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu pana ṭhapetvā nibbānaṃ sesadhammānaṃ vasena aniccatā veditabbā. Indriyāni aniccānevāti.
[06]Aparinipphannakathāvaṇṇanā.
[06]Tevīsatimo vaggo.
[21]Paṇṇāsakehi catūhi, tīhi vaggehi ceva ca;
[22]Saṅgahetvā kathā sabbā, ūnatisatabhedanā.
[21]Kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ, kathāmaggesu kovido;
[22]Yaṃ jino desayi tassa, niṭṭhitā atthavaṇṇanā.
[21]Imaṃ terasamattehi, bhāṇavārehi tantiyā;
[22]Ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ dhammassa, saṅkharontena yaṃ mayā.
[21]Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tena, lokoyaṃ sanarāmaro;
[22]Dhammarājassa saddhamma-rasamevādhigacchatūti.
[06]Kathāvatthu-aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā.
[06] Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
